programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: A pair of rescued mountain lion cubs are ready for their new habitat. Plus, a white rhino undergoes an intense procedure in the hope of saving the species!

programme.title: Live Snooker: UK Championship
programme.desc: Seema Jaswal presents coverage of the evening session on day one at York Barbican, featuring two first-round matches, played over the best of 11 frames. Three-time champion Ding Junhui edged past Robert Milkins 6-5 in last years corresponding session. In the other match, qualifier David Gilbert made six half-century breaks as he defeated 16th seed Xiao Guodong 6-4. With commentary and analysis from Steve Davis, John Parrott, Ken Doherty, Dennis Taylor, Stephen Hendry and Kyren Wilson, and reports from Shabnam Younus-Jewell

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: The vets have their work cut out after a herd of dairy farm cows becomes seriously ill, and Tristans metal detector proves surprisingly useful. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy, Robert Hardy and Peter Davison

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: Tristan takes a shine to the owner of a shy tortoise, and Mrs Donovans home-made animal remedies cause more problems than they cure. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy, Robert Hardy and Peter Davison

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: James treats a dog with a confusing complaint, Siegfried tries a herbal remedy on a sick sheep, and Tristan heads off to London for the Coronation. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy, Robert Hardy and Peter Davison

programme.title: Parkinson
programme.sub-title: Michael Palin, Kate Adie and Ricky Gervais
programme.desc: King of chat Michael Parkinson welcomes funnyman and explorer Michael Palin, who talks about his expedition across the Sahara Desert. He also talks to veteran BBC news correspondent Kate Adie, discussing her distinguished career, and actor-comedian Ricky Gervais, who reveals the inspiration for David Brent, his obnoxious character in award-winning sitcom The Office. Plus, music by singing sensation Norah Jones. From 2002

programme.title: The Secret Life of Waves
programme.desc: David Malone investigates the importance of ocean waves. He discovers they are not made of water, can travel sideways and their sound is created by bubbles, and examines the connection between the life cycles of waves and human beings

programme.title: Being the Brontës
programme.desc: Martha Kearney is joined by author Helen Oyeyemi and journalist Lucy Mangan to immerse themselves in the lives of Charlotte, Emily and Anne Brontë to discover the inspiration behind their classic novels Jane Eyre, Wuthering Heights and Agnes Grey. Travelling to the Haworth Parsonage in West Yorkshire, the trio discover how just two years before their most famous novels were published in 1847, the sisters prospects were bleak. Charlotte was in love with a married man, their clergyman father Patrick was going blind, and their brother, Branwell, was battling alcoholism. However, by 1848, Charlotte, Emily and Anne were literary sensations, and Martha, Helen and Lucy immerse themselves in the personal lives of the sisters to find out how this happened

programme.title: Live Snooker: UK Championship
programme.desc: Coverage of the evening session on day two at York Barbican, featuring two first-round matches, played over the best of 11 frames. Jack Lisowski fought back from 3-0 down to overcome two-time champion Mark Selby 6-4 at this stage last year, and qualifier Wu Yize prevailed by the same scoreline against 13th seed Si Jiahui. The UK Championship is one of the Triple Crown events and always a highlight of the snooker calendar. The roll call of champions in recent years has been varied, with a different winner in each year since the turn of the decade. Ronnie OSullivan is the most successful player in the tournaments history, with eight triumphs, the last of which came in 2023 with a 10-7 victory over Ding Junhui in the final. With commentary and analysis from Steve Davis, John Parrott, Ken Doherty, Dennis Taylor, Stephen Hendry and Kyren Wilson, and reports from Shabnam Younus-Jewell

programme.title: Life of a Mountain: A Year on Scafell Pike
programme.desc: Documentary charting Englands highest peak as it is transformed by the seasons - seen through the eyes of those who climb it for pleasure, those who try to protect its slopes and the Cumbrian farmers who work in the surrounding valleys and fells surrounding the Lake District National Park. Contributions from the British Mountaineering Council and National Trust volunteers highlight the importance of maintaining the landscape for future generations

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.desc: Over a relaxed weekend, distinguished guests gather at John Kenneth Galbraiths Vermont farm to offer their views on economics, politics and international relations and other themes outlined in the series, as well other major anxieties facing the world. Those attending were Gyorgy Arbatov, Ralf Dahrendorf, Katharine Graham, Edward Heath, Jack Jones, Henry Kissinger, MR Kukrit Pramoj, Arthur Schlesinger Jr, Hans Selye, Shirley Williams and Thomas Winship

programme.title: The Lost Libraries of Timbuktu
programme.desc: Aminatta Forna presents a documentary examining the literary tradition of Timbuktu in Mali, where hundreds of thousands of manuscripts have come to light in recent years. From the 13th to the 16th centuries, the city was a renowned seat of learning, and its black African scholars were revered throughout the Islamic world

programme.title: Life of a Mountain: A Year on Scafell Pike
programme.desc: Documentary charting Englands highest peak as it is transformed by the seasons - seen through the eyes of those who climb it for pleasure, those who try to protect its slopes and the Cumbrian farmers who work in the surrounding valleys and fells surrounding the Lake District National Park. Contributions from the British Mountaineering Council and National Trust volunteers highlight the importance of maintaining the landscape for future generations

programme.desc: Matt Tebbutt is joined by chefs Jamie Oliver and Georgina Hayden, and guest Bob Mortimer. Olly Smith picks the drinks, and Remi Idowu gives a cookie masterclass

programme.title: Mary at 90: A Lifetime of Cooking
programme.desc: Gardening expert Alan Titchmarsh invites Mary Berry for a special look behind the walls of his garden, where the pair cook and watch snippets of Marys old TV shows. Together, they make cauliflower soup, smoked salmon, asparagus and dill spaghetti, teriyaki tuna with ribbon salad, and apple cake served with cream

programme.desc: Hazel Irvine presents coverage of the afternoon session on day one from York Barbican, featuring two first-round matches, played over the best of 11 frames. Ronnie OSullivans defence of the title came to an early end at this stage last year when Barry Hawkins came back from 4-2 down to overcome him 6-4. There was also a 6-5 victory for Shaun Murphy against Zhao Xintong. With commentary and analysis from Steve Davis, John Parrott, Ken Doherty, Dennis Taylor, Stephen Hendry and Kyren Wilson, and reports from Shabnam Younus-Jewell

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: After the excitement of Blackpool, the couples are back in the studio, where its business as usual as they perform another routine in a bid to impress judges Shirley Ballas, Craig Revel Horwood, Motsi Mabuse and Anton Du Beke. Adding to the fun, they also face a new challenge in which they must perform a second dance, unaware of the style until a few seconds before they set foot on the ballroom floor. Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman have the details

programme.title: Michael McIntyres The Wheel
programme.desc: The comedian hosts the game show in which contestants answer questions with the aid of celebrity experts - aware that one wrong answer means someone else gets a chance. Advising the contestants are Rachel Riley, Ellie Simmonds, Richard Madeley, David Walliams, Adam Hills, Fatiha El-Ghorri, Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthews

programme.sub-title: This Town Is Turning Me Crazy
programme.desc: Lorna fights to get Grace back into school, whilst news of explicit photos on the internet shocks the community. Allegra tries to help Grace, but her plan backfires. The parents have a showdown at a wild party hosted by Gigi where dark forces are at play, and tragedy strikes Richford Lake

programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Manchester City v Leeds United at Etihad Stadium and Tottenham Hotspur v Fulham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Spurs were held to a 1-1 draw at home to Fulham last term, with Tom Cairney equalising for the Cottagers and also getting sent off. While his mother lies injured in hospital, the eldest son ventures into the ensuing chaos to search for his father and younger brothers, whom he was separated from during the crisis. Drama, with Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor and Tom Holland

programme.desc: Viewers opinions on BBC shows and behind-the-scenes reports on new programmes

programme.title: Ruby Gillman, Teenage Kraken
programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. A failed prom proposal culminates in Ruby plunging into the sea, and finally she discovers she is destined to inherit the throne from her kraken grandmother. Animated coming-of-age fantasy, featuring the voices of Lana Condor and Jane Fonda

programme.title: Tiddler
programme.desc: Animated adaptation of Julia Donaldson and Axel Schefflers childrens book about a little fish with a big imagination, who gets lost in the deep wide ocean. But his gift for storytelling may be just what he needs to find his way safely home. Narrated by Hannah Waddingham, and featuring the voices of Lolly Adefope, Jayde Adams and Rob Brydon

programme.title: Room on the Broom
programme.desc: Animated adaptation of the childrens book by author Julia Donaldson and illustrator Axel Scheffler, the creators of modern classic The Gruffalo. It tells the story of a kind witch who invites a surprising number of animals to ride on her broom - much to the frustration of her cat. But when a fearsome dragon appears, what will the gang do? Gillian Anderson heads the voice cast as the witch, with Rob Brydon, Martin Clunes, Sally Hawkins and David Walliams as the animals, Timothy Spall as the dragon and Simon Pegg as narrator

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: Lioness Rita is raising the next generation, but caring for her cubs alone leaves them vulnerable while she hunts. The hyenas strength is growing, but a flooded den spells disaster and the clan become separated. Seeking a mate, leopard Olimba begins a new chapter, but in her way is her daughter - she has now become her main rival, and only one can remain

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest forecast

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: John Craven and Vick Hope explore the scenery of the Lake District, following in the footsteps of JMW Turner to mark the 250th anniversary of the great landscape painters birth. They uncover the fells and lakes that inspired Turners art, and see how farming, rural life and tourism have shaped the contours of Cumbria. Plus, Adam Henson takes to the stage at the BBC Food and Farming Awards to crown Countryfiles Young Countryside Champion for 2025

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: An injured wild dog needs the support of his pack more than ever before, but in return he helps to care for Storms largest ever litter of puppies - revealing a new and surprising side to wild dogs. A showdown between mother and daughter sees leopard Olimba struggling to keep a grip on her territory, while the fragmented hyena clan is reuniting and rebuilding their strength

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman reveal which two celebrities have to compete in the dance-off, knowing one of them wont be making it through to next weeks quarter-final - which is also doubling up as musicals week. While the contestants await their fate, Myles Smith provides the music

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents a round-up of unseen treasures from the past series, including a mask from Phantom of the Opera, Queen Victorias parasol and a telegram from Ringo Starr to one of Scotlands foremost Scottish folk singers, Rab Noakes. Plus, in Stoke-on-Trent, Fiona pays a visit to the VandA Wedgwood Collection

programme.title: Prisoner 951
programme.desc: Nazanins solitary confinement ends, and she finds solace among fellow inmates. In London, a careless comment from an MP risks derailing her case. Richard and Nazanin make an agonising family decision

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Chelsea v Arsenal at Stamford Bridge and West Ham United v Liverpool at London Stadium. The Blues and Arsenal drew 1-1 in last seasons corresponding fixture and another closely fought contest between the London rivals was anticipated. The Reds won 5-0 at West Ham last term, but the Hammers will have hoped to me more competitive under Nuno Espirito Santo. Plus, Crystal Palace v Manchester United, Aston Villa v Wolverhampton Wanderers and Nottingham Forest v Brighton and Hove Albion

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The host is joined by eight-time Oscar-nominee Glenn Close, who is joining the cast of Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery. Also on the sofa are Emmy-winning Swedish star Alexander Skarsgard, who is playing a biker in British love story Pillion, actress and national treasure Miriam Margolyes, discussing her anthology The Little Book of Miriam, and Bridgerton star Nicola Coughlan, who is taking to the National Theatre stage. Plus, Jessie J performs HAPPY from her album Dont Tease Me with a Good Time

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Part two of two. With the Tardis destroyed and the Doctor gone, there is only one person who can stop the whole universe collapsing - a scared girl who still believes in stars. Finale of Matt Smith and Karen Gillans first run as the Doctor and Amy Pond, with Alex Kingston returning as River Song

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor checks in to a time travelling hotel in future London, and quickly discovers a sinister plot is afoot. Following the clue through a succession of eras, he discovers that the fate of the universe revolves around an ordinary woman seeking solitude at Christmas. Nicola Coughlan guest stars with Ncuti Gatwa in the 2024 Christmas special

programme.title: Match of the Day Live
programme.desc: Palmeiras v Flamengo (Kick-off 9.00pm). All the action from the all-Brazilian showpiece match in the South American equivalent to the UEFA Champions League, held at Estadio Monumental U in Lima, Peru. Palmeiras last won this competition in 2021 and reached the final in dramatic fashion, overturning a 3-0 first leg deficit against LDU Quito by winning 4-0 in front of their own fans. Flamengo are looking to regain the trophy they lifted in 2022 and they edged past Racing 1-0 on aggregate in the last four

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Gavin starts his job in Cardiff and, while Stacey is thrilled to be back in Wales, Smithy has to come to terms with living in Essex without his best friend. Nessa has taken up residence in Daves caravan in Sully and is getting ready for Neils christening. The event means a big reunion for the gang, at which Smithy receives surprising news from Nessa, and Stacey has a special request for her husband

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Dave is unhappy about Nessas plans to let Smithy see the baby, while Stacey ensures Gavin sticks to his promise as she tries to find a new job. Meanwhile, Dawn and Pete join Pam and Mick for a beer and curry night. Comedy, starring Joanna Page and Mathew Horne

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: Choreographer Claudimar Neto coaches the queens as they write and perform a show-stopping original song. As ever, its a family line-up for the finale, with Michelle Visage, Alan Carr and Graham Norton forming the judging panel, and last years winner and reigning champion, Kyran Thrax, dropping in along with the seasons eliminated queens

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: The devilish doings Down Under continue with Sophie feeling betrayed by her former Blood tribe - and looking to get her revenge - and Sandra feeling proud of her move to Water.

programme.title: Survivor Australia
programme.desc: Sophie knows that she has a target on her back and needs to shift it off of her, and Sandra reflects on her Day 16 curse

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Very average woman Spud cooks, cleans, serves and cares for her father. The only problem is she does it all rather badly - and half-heartedly. A woman who is never seen, unattractive and ignored, she does not feel bad about herself. However, when her father dies, she starts to realise she may have to come out from the shadow and be seen. Comedy drama, written by and starring Siobhán McSweeney

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Cindy goes looking for answers, Vicki continues to struggle, and Laurens hopes are raised, but all may not be as it seems

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Oscar makes a shocking discovery, tensions continue to rise in the Slater family, and Anna makes Freddie an offer

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Lauren wrestles with a difficult decision, Anthony supports Zoe, and Ian and Elaines feud intensifies

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Anthony looks to the future, Kims slip-up has consequences for Elaine, and the truth dawns on a horrified local

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: A feature-length special to conclude the anniversary celebrations, which stretches from a grey, damp and drizzly London all the way to the sparkling beauty of idyllic Saint Marie. A wealthy shipping magnate is found dead at a Christmas party. Things get stranger when a man in London receives a mysterious Christmas card connected to the victims death. Danny John-Jules makes a return as charismatic Officer Dwayne Myers, with special guests Mathew Baynton, Juliet Stevenson, Stanley Townsend, Jocelyn Jee Esien, Anthony Calf, Tessa Bonham Jones, Elizabeth Tan, Tariq Jordan and Sara Cox joining the regular cast

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: The gun-toting treasure seeker is thrown into a furious battle with a mysterious secret society as she races against time to locate the missing pieces of a legendary artefact that grants the owner the ability to control time. Action adventure based on the video games, starring Angelina Jolie, Daniel Craig, Leslie Phillips, Iain Glen, Chris Barrie and Jon Voight

programme.title: Fake Friend: The Ticket Scammer
programme.desc: The case of a Somerset high-flyer who turned his charm and connections into tools of deception, conning his friends and hundreds of others, while living a life of glamour himself. Through the voices of his victims and event industry insiders, this documentary uncovers the high personal and financial cost of chasing exclusivity, and how easily even the most cautious can be deceived

programme.title: The Kim Kardashian Diamond Heist
programme.desc: The inside story of the 2016 robbery and its impact, with those close to the case revealing details about the crime for the first time. Featuring interviews with friends of the family, police officers and journalists who have followed the case, this documentary recalls the fateful night when the US reality TV star was robbed of millions of dollars worth of jewellery in Paris at gunpoint

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Sitcom about a father and daughter reunited when the latter falls pregnant. Exhausted Gemma, living with her three-month-old daughter, sees her formerly estranged mother Davina move in. Instead of helping, her mum lives an irritatingly carefree life. Meanwhile, father Malcolm is living back at the bedsit, sleeping on an inflatable bed on the landing. Missing her dad and in a state of despair, Gemma conspires with Malcolm and Derek to hatch a plot to oust Davina. Starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey, Jill Halfpenny and Sarah Hadland

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Longing for her old life, Gemma tries reliving a past night out, only to realise she has changed for ever and misses Sadie. Malcolm assumes babysitting duties, only to find his evening upturned by Derek, who ropes the grandfather into helping him exact revenge on his ex-wife. In an attempt to support his friend, while keeping Sadie safe from all perceived threats, Malcolm panics when Gemma announces she is coming home early. Comedy, starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey, Jill Halfpenny and Sarah Hadland

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Single, penniless poet Ruby has recently moved back home to live with her mother, Jen. When their strict Presbyterian neighbours descend on the home for her spoiled sister Elizas engagement party, Rubys only job is to not shame the family. Short, one-off comedy, starring Amy Molloy

programme.desc: The competition begins at the Coachman Inn in Hartford, Cheshire, where owner Justin Hyam surprises his guests with a romantic revelation at dinner and a breakfast bombshell

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The Foxhall Village Guest House in Blackpool is this weeks second venue, where the food falls short of expectations and not everyone has a good nights sleep

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week takes place at the Douglas Hotel in Hartlepool, where owner Raqeeb Ramzan and his uncle Raj Malik hope to impress their guests

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Mike and Sue Brierley welcome their rivals to Gables Pod Camping in Escomb in County Durham. Their guests are pleased with the pods, but while Justin basks in his bunk bed, Tina worries about where shes going to sleep. Over dinner, Mike and Sues revelation about how they met amuses their guests, but the fun atmosphere is soon replaced by an awkward tension when payment day is discussed, and the evening ends with one guest on a sofa and another in a hot tub

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandB owners meet up for a final showdown, as Justin gives Tina and Kay a platform for their feedback about noisy trains and seeks to know more about Raqeebs problems with his shower. Tina and Kay want to clear up Raqeeb and Rajs cleanliness comments before discussing what really happened at breakfast. After dramatic discoveries and frank exchanges, the payments are revealed and the winner is announced

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: Teenager Charlie discovers his frequently absent father is secretly a superhero after finding the hi-tech headquarters under his home. However, when an evil mastermind hatches a plot, it falls to Charlie and his friends to use the lairs resources to save the day. Comedy adventure, starring Owen Wilson and Michael Pena

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: In Waterbeach, Cambridgshire, Amber and Martin Brammah needed help with their three-bed semi. Amber, who owns her own fitness company and runs classes from home, was firmly Team List It. She wanted a bigger, brighter space for her clients and a more family-friendly layout in the rest of the house. Principal ecologist Martin was very much Team Love It. He liked his five-minute commute to work and believed that Kirstie could formulate a plan to transform their home. In one of the most turbulent builds ever, did Kirstie pull it out of the bag?

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer take two couples house-hunting in south Wales. Chris and Laura want a slice of the countryside with dreams of a vegetable patch in a huge garden for their one-year-old son Jack to play in but when the perfect place arises reality brings them down from cloud nine. Bob and Lara want a three-to-four bed family home in the city and parking is a must but Phil struggles to tick all the boxes in the competitive Cardiff housing market where theyve already been outbid 10 times

programme.title: New Zealands Best Homes with Phil Spencer
programme.desc: Phil tours a clifftop masterpiece with breathtaking harbour views, a beautiful family home in Remuera and a Queenstown mountain retreat with an edge. All three homes have family at their core, built to adapt alongside lifes seasons, whether thats with all the kids and grandchildren at home, or if its just mum or dad

programme.title: Secrets of the Christmas Market
programme.desc: Now in its 20th year, Belfasts much-loved festive market is set to be bigger than ever, and a team of 50 people has just two weeks to transform the empty grounds of Belfast City Hall into a spectacular winter wonderland. Market boss Allan, in his last year before retirement, is eager to make this the best market yet, as stallholders from 30 different countries join local traders to create and sell everything from hand-made trinkets to religious artefacts, to pancakes so good that they cause queues around the block. This documentary looks behind the scenes, meeting some of the people who bring Christmas to life at one of the UKs most popular events

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Alpine Train at Christmas
programme.desc: A festive ride on the illustrious Bernina Express, one of the most picturesque trains in the world, beginning in Chur, the oldest town in Switzerland, and travelling through the Alpine landscape to the town of Tirano in Italy. Along the way, the train visits the Morteratsch Glacier, the Landwasser Viaduct and Lago Bianco, meeting people who live and work in the area including an artisan cheese-maker, a creator of traditional Christmas toys and a multi-generational musical farming family. Narrated by Hugh Bonneville

programme.title: Sandi Toksvigs Great Riviera Rail Trip
programme.desc: Sandi takes a tour of iconic locations on the French coast, discovering the stories of monarchs, artists, and celebrities who transformed the region into a prestigious holiday destination. She starts with a rail journey from Marseille to St Tropez. She taps into her inner Viking with a spot of sailing, hits the beach that launched a sexual revolution in the 1960s, and helps out in the vineyard with one of Provences biodynamic winemakers

programme.title: Devon and Cornwall
programme.desc: In this special Christmas episode, the volunteer lifeboat crew at Clovelly prepare their villages decorations, including a mile of lights from top to bottom of the village, and a Christmas tree made from ocean rubbish that washed up on the seashore. Further inland, it is festive full steam ahead for the volunteers on the Dartmouth Steam Railway, who are busy transforming a locomotive and 10 carriages into a steam train of over 50,000 lights, while a farmer at St Mabyn is busy working on mulled cider

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.sub-title: 2025 Qatar Grand Prix Sprint Race And Qualifying
programme.desc: Lee McKenzie is joined by David Coulthard to present action from the 23rd round of the season, held at Lusail International Circuit. McLarens Oscar Piastri won the sprint race here last year, with his teammate Lando Norris in second place, but it was Red Bulls Max Verstappen who took pole position and went on to win the main race

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong

programme.title: Proxima
programme.desc: An engineer leads a compliex life as a single mother and the only woman on an intensive astronaut training programme. She prepares for a year-long assignment aboard the International Space Station, that will serve as a stepping stone to a mission to Mars, but the separation from he rdaughter takes its toll on both of them. Sci-fi drama, starring Eva Green, Zelie Boulant-Lemesle and Matt Dillon

programme.title: Ramsays Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Part two of two. Gordon Ramsay continues to uncover problems at the Juniper Hill Inn in Windsor, Vermont. The chef tries to help the staff communicate with owners Robert and Ari, but after he catches one of them telling a shocking lie, will it be the final straw?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Krusty nearly kills Homer after a bad TV review and hides out in a circus, but soon finds himself the centre of attention

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from south Wales compete to host the best dinner party and win the £1,000 prize, beginning with beautician Rachael and her partner Nick, who prepare a selection of dishes theyve never made before. Dionne and Ameel prepare an Indian-inspired meal on the second night of the competition, before Angela and Jeff hope their no-nonsense menu can secure them the money

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Some extra brunch with Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Part one of two. Coach falls for an unscrupulous woman who drops him when she wins the lottery, while Sam lusts after her daughter. Bette Ford and Ellen Regan guest star

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Part two of two. Sam fails to make an impression on the object of his desire, and Coach faces a tough test when the woman he loves dumps him after a big-money win on the lottery

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam cracks open the champagne to celebrate Norms birthday, while Diane meets Frasiers mother, who threatens terrible consequences unless she stays away from her son

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Carla finds herself fighting her ex-husband Nick in a battle for custody of their eldest son. Comedy, starring Ted Danson and Rhea Perlman

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra is angry to discover Ray recorded a Super Bowl game over their wedding video, and forces him to renew his marriage vows as a way of making amends. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Rays efforts to take an interest in one of Allys hobbies backfire, leaving him searching for a particularly rare trading card to make amends. American comedy, starring Ray Romano, Madylin Sweeten and Patricia Heaton

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The family prepares to mourn a relatives death, and while Frasier and Niles organise the funeral in their usual hopeless style, Martin tries to finish a song he began writing for Frank Sinatra. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Kate encourages Bulldog to continue his audience-grabbing practical jokes against Frasier, who decides to exact a suitable revenge - blissfully unaware that such pranks have a nasty habit of backfiring. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and Dan Butler

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer host the food and chat show

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family goes on holiday to Niagara Falls, where a mix-up sees Lisa mistakenly granted asylum in Canada and Marge has to come to her daughters rescue

programme.title: Were Going on a Bear Hunt
programme.desc: Animated adventure based on the popular childrens bedtime book by Michael Rosen and Helen Oxenbury. Stan, Katie, Rosie, Max and the baby, along with Rufus the dog, all embark on a quest to find some bears. Trekking through whirling snowstorms, muddy bogs and dark forests, the siblings refuse to let anything get in their way. However, when Rosie and Rufus get lost, bear-hunting suddenly doesnt seem quite so much fun after all. Featuring the voices of Olivia Colman, Pam Ferris and Mark Williams as Mum, Grandma and Dad respectively

programme.title: Terry Pratchetts The Abominable Snow Baby
programme.desc: David Harewood narrates this animated adaptation of the short story about a small town where the Christmas festivities are thrown into upheaval by the appearance of a 14-foot snow monster. The creature is adopted by a kindly grandmother, but not everyone is pleased with her new guest. With the voices of Julie Walters and Hugh Dancy

programme.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
programme.desc: Hand-drawn animated version of Judith Kerrs much-loved tale, which celebrated its 50th anniversary in 2018. A tea-guzzling tiger turns up unannounced and eats and drinks young Sophie and her mummy out of everything in the house, even draining the water from their taps. Narrated by David Walliams, with David Oyelowo providing the voice for the big cat alongside seven-year-old Clara Ross as Sophie, with other characters played by Benedict Cumberbatch, Tamsin Greig and Paul Whitehouse

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great New Years Bake Off 2022
programme.desc: Noel Fielding, Matt Lucas, Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood invite four former contestants to return to the tent in the hope of being crowned the first Star Baker of 2023. The hopefuls are 2021 finalist Chigs, 2020s Lottie and Manon and Antony from 2018. To help see in the new year, the bakers, family and friends are entertained by the cast of Riverdance

programme.title: Inside McVities at Christmas
programme.desc: One of Britains best-known biscuit brands gear up for their busiest time of year. Facing an ultra-competitive Christmas market, this programme reveals how McVities attempt to stay ahead of their rivals, including a very special twist on the iconic Penguin bar and the creation of a brand-new product - the white chocolate digestive

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jamie Oliver demonstrates festive recipes, beginning with cheesy filo parcels with a cranberry dip, and a cauliflower lasagne using the hasselback technique and a festive jerk-inspired rub, paired with chicken, sausage and bacon party kebabs to get his guests in the party mood. Jamie also mixes up walnuts, Medjool dates and festive spices to make a sticky toffee coffee pudding

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jamie invites his family to join him in his outdoor kitchen shed and makes smoked trout pâte, served with red cabbage slaw and a giant Yorkshire pudding for sharing. He gives the traditional turkey a run for its money with festive porchetta, crispy root veg and roast potatoes, and also takes a Christmas staple to new heights in his vegetarian main, a chestnut and Brussels sprouts pie

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: A Very British Hotel
programme.sub-title: A Very British Hotel at Christmas
programme.desc: Cameras go behind the scenes at Browns, Londons oldest luxury hotel, during the Christmas season, as staff face the expectations of delivering a luxury festive stay for guests booking rooms that start at £750 a night. The hotels elite team hosts a vibrant charity Christmas fayre, creates imaginative festive pastries, and concocts a signature holiday cocktail, all aimed at delivering the Christmas feast of a lifetime

programme.title: Game of Wool: Britains Best Knitter
programme.desc: For Texture Week, the solo challenge demands ultra-realistic amigurumi food so lifelike that it looks good enough to eat. Then, split into three teams, the contestants must collaborate to create the ultimate textured slouchy cardigan. Precision and stitchwork are key as the pressure mounts. Only six knitters are left, and one more will be cast off this week

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Lee McKenzie is joined by David Coulthard to present action from the 23rd round of the season, held at Lusail International Circuit. Red Bulls Max Verstappen was the victorious driver here last year, with Charles Leclerc of Ferrari finishing second and McLarens Oscar Piastri completing the podium

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: An ageing assassin is targeted by a mysterious young operative that seems able to anticipate his every move. Discovering that hes being hunted by a younger clone of himself, Henry needs to find out why hes being targeted and who the creator is. Action drama, starring Will Smith, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Clive Owen

programme.title: Ramsays Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in to the River Rock Inn in Milford, Pennsylvania, where owner Ken Pisciotta is struggling to attract guests and battling huge debts. He has all but given up and his constant negativity is rubbing off on the staff. Can Gordon get this establishment back on track before Ken loses everything?

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Eric Casaburi, the CEO of Retro Fitness, poses as a contestant on a reality show who is trying to win money to open his own gym. He hopes to highlight methods that will ensure success as he expands the business, and discovers whether his own employees are passionate about the brand

programme.title: Cancer Detectives: Finding the Cures
programme.desc: The work of trailblazing scientists taking on the disease, exploring how their pioneering work is changing patients lives right now. This programme focuses on Professor Sarah Blagden, who is attempting to stop cancer before it even starts. Her pioneering clinical trials feature Trevor, a retired Navy veteran whose skin cancer has spread. Could Sarahs immunotherapy trial save Trevors life? Twenty six-year-old Ella has a genetic condition giving her a 90 per cent chance of developing cancer. Ella hopes to join Sarahs prevention trial and live without fear

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Swansea and Bridgend compete to throw the best dinner party. Kathy and Justin kick off the competition with an Italian-inspired menu, which is overshadowed by Pauls poor table manners and tactless banter. Mark and Maria are the next to host and serve their leftovers-inspired starter, chicken lettuce boats. Finally, its time for Kathy to wreak revenge during Paul and Sarahs evening. Chaos in the kitchen ensues, culminating in a showdown at the table

programme.desc: A look at the wedding of Princess Elizabeth and Prince Philip in 1947, which lifted spirits in bleak post-war Britain, with historian Lisa Hilton delving into the royal archives to dig out the wedding menu. programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The pals plan a surprise party for Rachel, but her recently separated mother and father show up. To keep the parents apart, the gang decides to have two different gatherings. Comedy, guest starring Marlo Thomas and Ron Leibman

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe catches chickenpox just as her seafaring boyfriend returns home. Joey gets a job at Chandlers company and Monica becomes obsessed with proving Richard is more neurotic than she is. American comedy, guest starring Charlie Sheen

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Barry and Mindys Wedding
programme.desc: Chandler becomes enamoured with a woman he meets on the internet, and the subject of children proves a thorny one for Monica and Richard. programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Princess Leia Fantasy
programme.desc: Ross foolishly lets Rachel in on his most secret sexual fantasy, while Phoebe consoles a heartbroken Monica and Chandler gets involved with an old flame whom Joey cannot stand. David Schwimmer and Jennifer Aniston star

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where No Ones Ready
programme.desc: Ross is due to make an important speech at the museum, and invites the gang along for moral support - but bickering and personal problems soon threaten to make him late. Comedy, starring David Schwimmer

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe is alarmed to learn she has attracted the unwanted attentions of a stalker, and Monica comes up with a plan to deal with her broodiness. American comedy, guest starring David Arquette, with Lisa Kudrow and Courteney Cox

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Metaphorical Tunnel
programme.desc: Chandler ponders the importance of commitment, Monica starts work in a restaurant and Phoebes home truths make her an unpopular choice as Joeys agent. Comedy, starring Matt LeBlanc and Matthew Perry

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Actress Isabella Rossellini makes Rosss day by dropping into Central Perk for a coffee. Phoebes efforts to introduce her half-brother to the city give him the wrong idea about her line of work. Comedy, with David Schwimmer, Lisa Kudrow and Giovanni Ribisi

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Janice persuades the pals to reveal their deepest, darkest secrets about a period in their relationships three years earlier. programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Race Car Bed
programme.desc: Monica buys a bed from Janices husband but the wrong one is delivered. Joey gets a job teaching a soap opera acting class, while Rachel tries to ease the tension between Ross and her father

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Giant Poking Device
programme.desc: Phoebe convinces herself she is a walking jinx who keeps causing people to die mysteriously. Monica hides the fact that Ben has been injured, while Chandler and Janice make a tough decision about their relationship

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang holds an American football match on Thanksgiving. Opposing team captains Ross and Monica relive their sibling rivalry on the pitch, while Joey tries to outflank Chandler

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel hands in her notice at Central Perk, while Ross accidentally breaks a girls leg and ends up having to go door to door peddling cookies. Joey starts a new job selling Christmas trees, but Phoebe thinks it is a cruel trade and sets about saving the merchandise

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: Rachels attractive and influential new friend sends Ross into a jealous frenzy, while Chandler gets drunk and falls for the curvaceous charms of one of Joeys many sisters - but later cannot remember which one

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Jealousy

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends

programme.desc: In Nottingham, three rival couples compete to host the best dinner party and win £1,000. Ultra-competitive accountants Omer and Adeeba serve up an experimental Asian menu. Sustainable food growers Bobby and Alison, who live in a yurt in the grounds of a grand stately home, dish out homegrown, organic food under the stars. On the final night, Liz and Stuart host, and Stuart realises that it might be an uphill battle to impress their rivals. None of their guests is aware that Stuart and Liz dont actually live together, but questions are raised when Adeeba and Alison dont find any of Stuarts clothes in the master bedroom, and Omer and Bobby discover Stuarts campervan with a double bed parked outside

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the West Country, three rival couples compete to host the best dinner party. On the first night, handyman Sam and his wife Kate attempt a restaurant quality meal. On night two, proud Somerset pair Colin and Kate host at their family farm and serve pork sourced from Colins brothers pig farm. On the final night, festival lovers Aron and Kath put on a beach-themed dinner party, and although they are confident about their culinary prowess, disaster strikes on not one, but two courses. The rest of their meal comes together well, but is it enough to bag the cash prize of £1,000?

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Mojito, a Cuban cafe in Brooklyn, New York. The restaurant was the shared dream of two newlyweds who have separated since its opening, and whose constant public quarrelling is distracting staff and driving customers away

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay visits family-run Luigis in Orange County, California, where lazy shortcuts following the retirement of the owners father have led the business to suffer. Ramsay faces the daunting task of reuniting a feuding family, before turning around the struggling restaurant, which currently has 126 dishes on the menu

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to the Parks Edge restaurant in Atlanta, Georgia, where a series of spats with the local community are hampering its success. Owners Richard and Jorges in-fighting has alienated locals, and the duos suggestion that customer numbers are low because of racism has heightened tensions

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to the Greek at the Harbour restaurant in southern California, where owner Makis Mikelatos works 17 hours a day, seven days a week, but is unwilling to let his son Ari take the reins. Gordon sets out to get to the bottom of Makiss reluctance to teach his son, and uncovers a shocking family secret

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to Mike and Nellies Steakhouse in Oakhurst, New Jersey, where owner Mike Farber is mourning his father Nellie, who was also his business partner. Having been called in by the restaurateurs two daughters, Gordon faces the task of getting him to focus on his business, before tackling the bigger problem of rotting decor and a less-than-appealing menu

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay travels to the El Greco restaurant in Austin, Texas, where the owners have resorted to using a microwave to prepare their authentic Greek dishes. Gordon faces the difficult task of uniting a squabbling family before tackling the bigger problem of a business on the brink of collapse

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.desc: This festive episode from 1996 finds the Craggy Island clerics and six other priests lost in what seems to be the worlds largest lingerie department, with only Teds quick thinking preventing the Catholic Church being rocked by a major scandal. His bravery earns him the coveted Golden Cleric award, which is when his troubles really begin. Comedy, starring Dermot Morgan, Ardal OHanlon and Frank Kelly

programme.title: Joe Lycett: Im About to Lose Control and I Think Joe Lycett
programme.desc: In a gig recorded at the Hammersmith Apollo, London, Joe Lycett shares jokes, paintings and some of the pathetic trolling hes been up to, such as breaking into banks, selling art for £12.5million and taking on bronze medal-winning Olympians

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts, as Roisin Conaty and Asim Chaudhry take on Jon Richardson and Josh Widdicombe. Bill Bailey is in Dictionary Corner. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr is joined by captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson for highlights from the latest series of the comedy panel show. A host of well-known faces make up the teams as they discuss the topical events that set the publics chins wagging

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys head to the mall, where they save strangers from being shot with a water gun

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q share sad stories in the park, then offer up new video game ideas in a focus group, and head to the florist to stump each other

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q ask strangers to hold a random object for them, then teach business seminars controlled by the others

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q do and say whatever they are told while barefoot at a department store, and start conversations with strangers using a single word

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos featuring sheep

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Ericas college graduation is completely forgotten and everyones only interested the imminent baby, she wonders if she even matters any more

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica asks Geoff to take her on a babymoon, far away from Beverly, whose mania about the upcoming birth is making her miserable. Adam and Barry learn how to be great uncles

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam visits Dave Kim at university to celebrate Halloween and is surprised to learn he has reinvented himself, while Geoff is terrified of Beverly taking over baby-care duties

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly embraces her new life as a grandmother while trying to stay young at heart, and Adam gets a job while he waits to start at New York University

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam and Barry do whatever it takes to ensure that Beverly has a joyous Thanksgiving free of conflict, but their plans go awry

programme.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Having spent most of her life exploring the jungle with her parents, nothing could prepare Dora for her most dangerous adventure ever - high school. Always the explorer, Dora quickly finds herself leading Boots (her best friend, a monkey), Diego, a mysterious jungle inhabitant and a rag tag group of teens on a live-action adventure to save her parents and solve the impossible mystery behind a lost city of gold. Live-action adaptation of the hit animated kids show, starring Isabela Merced, Eva Longoria and Jeff Wahlberg

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay is in Redondo Beach, California, for the first of two visits to Zayna Flaming Grill, a Mediterranean restaurant owned and run by aunt and niece Faye and Brenda. Faye believes she has the weight of the entire restaurant on her shoulders, while Brenda feels she isnt treated as an equal in the business. With tensions rising, the food not up to scratch and everyone playing the blame game, the chef is faced with one of the trickiest situations hes ever encountered

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay concludes his visit to Zayna Flaming Grill in Redondo Beach, California, and finds more questions than answers as he tries to save the crisis-ridden restaurant from disaster. While trying to inject some much-needed flavour into the tired Mediterranean menu, the chef also encourages aunt-and-niece duo Faye and Brenda to settle their differences

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Things dont run smoothly as Amy and Sheldons cohabitation experiment continues, forcing Leonard and Penny to intervene when the couple have an argument about the bathroom schedule. Howard and Bernadette cancel their holiday plans when Bernadette feels unwell and decide to have a secret stay-cation at home instead. However, the pair are soon disturbed by unexpected guests dropping by

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny discovers she has a dedicated group of fans from her Serial Ape-ist days when she accompanies Leonard to a comic-con. Meanwhile, Sheldon and Amy host a brunch at Pennys flat, and stress over the babys arrival prompts Howard to make an impulsive purchase

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After the repairs are completed in Amys flat, she lies to Sheldon by telling him that the work is still ongoing so they can carry on living together for a while longer. Leonard is upset when he finds out Penny has been moving his collectibles out of Sheldons old room and into storage behind his back

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon goes to great lengths to convince Amy that they should have a baby together after they successfully complete a scientific experiment using their DNA samples. Raj is too embarrassed to tell his friends what the new woman in his life does for a living

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great Christmas Bake Off 2017 - Part One
programme.desc: A programme from 2017 in which Noel Fielding, Sandi Toksvig, Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood welcome back eight past contestants to compete once more. In this first of two editions, Paul Jagger, Beca Lyne-Pirkis, Selasi Gbormittah and Val Stones face three festive challenges as they compete to win the Christmas Star Baker title

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer agrees to a request from Mel Gibson to help re-edit his latest film, a remake of the James Stewart classic Mr Smith Goes to Washington - and shocks the studio executives by adding a lot more action scenes

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family relocates to an abandoned farm, where Homer discovers he has a talent for growing tomatoes - which prove highly addictive and soon attract the attention of unscrupulous rival businesses. Featuring the guest voices of the B-52s

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer falls for a sexy colleague and tries to avoid her, fearing he may be unable to resist temptation. However, Mr Burns sends the two of them on a business trip together and the enforced intimacy puts an intolerable strain on his willpower. Featuring the guest voice of Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: $pringfield (Or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Legalised Gambling)
programme.desc: Mr Burns decides to open a casino in Springfield, and it is not before long Marge is bitten by the gambling bug - much to the dismay of her family. Animated comedy, with the guest voices of Gerry Cooney and Robert Goulet

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer gets a new job at a better nuclear power plant, forcing the family to move to an apparently idyllic community - but his boss turns out to be a megalomaniac super-villain with dreams of world domination. Featuring the guest voice of Albert Brooks

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Moe is elated to discover Homer was born with a unique genetic condition that protects his brain from injury, and decides to cash in by training him to be a boxer. Featuring the guest voice of Paul Winfield

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer finds himself being rushed to hospital suffering from food poisoning as a consequence of Apus misconduct at the Kwik-E-Mart. Featuring the guest voice of James Woods

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics cast their eyes over 2021s biggest Christmas TV shows. Theyll be passing comment on the most talked about hits from the festive season, including Michael McIntyres Christmas Wheel, First Dates at Christmas, Strictly the Real Full Monty, Jamie: Together at Christmas, Love Actually, Worlds Strongest Man, I Can See Your Voice Christmas Special, The Repair Shop at Christmas, Elves, Nigellas Cook, Eat, Repeat, and No Time to Die

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions to the Eurovision Song Contest, Bridgerton, Love Triangle Australia, Double the Money, Marcus Wareing Simply Provence, Narrow Escapes and news coverage of the Northern Lights being visible in British skies

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including Bridgerton, The Piano, Britains Got Talent, Inside No. 9, My Strange Addiction: Still Addicted?, Top of the Pops 1984, The War on Britains Motorists: Dispatches and a features on This Morning about sandwiches. First shown in May 2024

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Student Leah is on her first-ever date and sits down for a meal with Ashley from Huddersfield, who has hair to rival Harry Styles and a winning superstar smile. Liverpudlian welder Daniel lacks confidence with woman, but bonds with student midwife Emily over their shared passion for romcom films, while Antonia hopes to meet a man who wants to get to know the woman behind the uniform, but finds it difficult to let her guard down when she meets 34-year-old rugby player Pete

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Recipe developer Mimi is looking for a fun-loving fellow creative and her date with rugby referee and sausage roll-maker Joel starts well when he turns up with a gift for her. Theatre producer Sue, meets American psychologist Beri, who is looking for an English rose, while rugby player Dan seems to tick all of Irish model Lauras boxes, but when she finds out what he does for a living, things could take a turn for the worse

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics cast their eyes over 2021s biggest Christmas TV shows. Theyll be passing comment on the most talked about hits from the festive season, including Michael McIntyres Christmas Wheel, First Dates at Christmas, Strictly the Real Full Monty, Jamie: Together at Christmas, Love Actually, Worlds Strongest Man, I Can See Your Voice Christmas Special, The Repair Shop at Christmas, Elves, Nigellas Cook, Eat, Repeat, and No Time to Die

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Rosaria bought Bella Luna to realise her son Gianfrancos ambition to become a chef, but the Italian restaurants future looks bleak due to his lack of experience in the kitchen combined with her refusal to acknowledge the eaterys many flaws. Gordon Ramsay heads to Easton, Pennsylvania, to help the troubled pair and save the business from financial disaster

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants he helped that were among the biggest challenges he faced, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he meets sisters Rita and Lisa to see if they have continued serving fresh instead of frozen food at Bostons La Galleria 33, before heading to the Olde Hitching Post in Hanson, Massachusetts, to discover whether controlling owner Tom has kept his promise and handed over the reins to his daughter Andrea. Finally, Gordon goes back to the Prohibition gastro pub in Everett, Washington, to catch up with owner Rishi and learn if she has ditched belly-dancing in favour of running her business

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Warren tries his best to support Mercedes, but his scorned ex-girlfriend is never far away, guilt consumes one resident, and Frankie opens up about her past. Sienna, Dodger and the McQueens step in to help new mum Cleo finally get the support she needs. Also, Mercedes and Ste find themselves on a path of self-destruction

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Featuring a variety of cats doing strange things, soldiers stuck in the sand and a dog balancing on a rope

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef heads to Babylon in New York, where the peace of Long Island is regularly shattered by the volatile Pellegrino family, proprietors of Peters Italian Restaurant. Gordon finds owner Tinas work to save the eatery from oblivion is frequently ruined by the behaviour of her brother, a tyrannical front-of-house manager whose violent temper constantly undermines staff morale

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef tries to reverse the fortunes of the Mixing Bowl diner in Bellmore, New York, where a talented cooks work is being undone by the managers marketing plans - putting the finances in dire straits

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef heads to the Seascape restaurant in the village of Islip on Long Island, New York, in a bid to change the fortunes of its owner Peter Matthews, who is nearly $1million in debt. Gordon is dismayed to discover unprotected meat and fish left next to mouldy pesto jars in the kitchen and plans to close down the eatery until radical changes are made

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef comes to the aid of a French restaurant in the heart of Moorpark, California. The pompous, over-complicated cuisine is keeping the customers away and there is an imminent threat of bankruptcy. However, the owner is vigorously opposed to change, despite the failings of his current business model

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny hosts a Halloween costume party, which proves a worthy test for the boys social skills. During the event, Leonard has a run-in with Pennys ex-boyfriend. Kaley Cuoco, Johnny Galecki and Simon Helberg star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon cannot contain his jealousy when he hears that his university colleague Bert has won a prestigious fellowship with an impressive grant. Elsewhere, Howard finds an old remote-controlled toy he made in the past, but the rest of the group do not seemed to be too impressed by it. Stephen Hawking guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon, Amy, Leonard and Penny do their best to divide up all their possessions into two separate households, but tension ensues. Raj and Stuart compete to become indispensable to Howard and Bernadette as the babys arrival looms. Christopher Lloyd guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amys attempts to celebrate her birthday with an intimate night at home are interrupted by the news that Bernadette has gone into labour. However, it transpires that Howard, Raj and Stuart may have rushed the expectant mother to the hospital too early, with Raj having difficulty keeping the gender of the unborn child a secret

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great Festive Bake Off 2017 - Part Two
programme.desc: In the second of two yuletide specials from 2017, Noel Fielding, Sandi Toksvig, Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood welcome back four past contestants to compete once more, with Benjamina Ebuehi, Rob Billington, Rav Bansal and Sandy Docherty taking on a series of Winter Wonderland-themed challenges in a bid to win the Star Baker title

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After spending the holidays apart, the gang get together to hear about Sheldons and Amys trip to his mothers, Leonard and Penny recall their Christmas tree adventure, and Howard and Bernadette open up about their first days as parents

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny thinks that Leonard is taking her for granted and has stopped making an effort in their relationship, so she decides to go away for a spa weekend with Amy. Howard and Raj go to extreme lengths to deal with a squeaky floorboard in the babys bedroom

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tests a newly invented device after hearing that it can help him to read peoples emotions. Leonard isnt happy when he finds out that Pennys brother is coming to town so that she can help him to find a job. Raj gathers his ex-girlfriends together so that they can give him some dating advice

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer claims he encountered an extraterrestrial on a drunken walk home, prompting X-Files agents Mulder and Scully to investigate both him and the sighting. Featuring the guest voices of David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Krusty learns he has a long-lost daughter, but ruins any chances of a happy family life by gambling away her most prized possession in a high-stakes poker game. Featuring the guest voices of Drew Barrymore, John Updike, Amy Tam and Stephen King

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family constructs a tennis court in the back garden and Bart becomes an expert player, much to the annoyance of a jealous Homer. Featuring the guest voices of Venus and Serena Williams, Andre Agassi and Pete Sampras

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family heads to New York after Bart hears his ex-girlfriend Mary Spuckler (Zooey Deschanel) is living there. But once he arrives, the spiky-haired youngster revisits a few more of his old flames - voiced by Anne Hathaway, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Natalie Portman and Sarah Silverman - while Lisa and Marge take in the local culture

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brazilian football legend Ronaldo visits the town to advise Homer on refereeing Little League matches, while Marge reacts to accusations of technophobia by purchasing a PC - and soon becomes hooked on a game involving a virtual Springfield being terrorised by Bart

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: In 1987, lonely Californian teenager Charlie Watson is traumatised by the death of her father and resentful of her mother Sallys relationship with new boyfriend Ronald. For her 18th-birthday shes given a yellow Volkswagen Beetle, which turns out to be the battle-scarred Autobot Bumblebee. Transformers prequel, starring Hailee Steinfeld, John Cena and Jorge Lendeborg Jr

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster caused by mysterious arms dealer John Lark and a group of terrorists known as the Apostles. However, Hunt and his colleagues are soon pushed to their limits thanks to a face from their past. Writer/director Christopher McQuarries sixth entry in the action thriller saga, starring Tom Cruise, Henry Cavill, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The sofa-critics watch The Crown, Im a Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here!, You Wont Believe This, Down to Earth with Zac Efron, This Morning with Marie Kondo, The Hidden Lives of Pets, and ITV News and the World Cup

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Reviews of The Traitors, Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!, Michael McIntyres The Wheel, Planet Sex with Cara Delevingne, Mammals, You Wont Believe This and Help! My House Is Haunted

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson presents the dating show in which two singletons choose their favourite from a line-up of potential dates who reveal themselves one body part at a time - in all their naked glory. First up is 24-year-old beautician Gemma from West Sussex. She has dated a few love rats and is now searching for her Prince Charming. She is followed by 28-year-old bisexual tattoo artist Jennafer, who is fed up of men and now wants to find the perfect woman. Will any of the contestants be just what Jennafer is looking for?

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Fitness fanatic Jade, 24, sits down for a meal with Jak, 29, a yoga lover in touch with his spiritual side and who shares her love of exercise and tattoos, while fashion stylist Christine, 70, and entrepreneur Peter, 71, share stories of the Swinging Sixties. Health club manager Donna, 51, is a born romantic with old fashioned values at heart and her date is 53-year-old stetson-wearing Simon from Dallas, Texas, whos happy to stand out from the crowd and is looking for a strong woman to stand by his side

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Ericas college graduation is completely forgotten and everyones only interested the imminent baby, she wonders if she even matters any more

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica asks Geoff to take her on a babymoon, far away from Beverly, whose mania about the upcoming birth is making her miserable. Adam and Barry learn how to be great uncles

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at the worlds caves, including the Lechuguilla Cave in America, which contains chambers filled with 6m-long crystals. He observes creatures in Texas and Thailand that never see daylight, and inside Deer Cave in Borneo he finds five million bats whose droppings support an entire ecosystem

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The nature series looks at animals that live on some of the worlds highest mountains. Cameras show gelada baboons screaming to frighten off predators in Ethiopia, demoiselle cranes struggling to migrate over the Himalayas, snow leopards hunting on the peaks of Pakistan and a wild giant panda nursing a baby in a hillside cave. Presented by David Attenborough

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough focuses on animals living in deserts. Cameras explore the dry Atacama of Chile, where guanacos survive by licking dew off cacti, and capture the rare sight of wild camels eating snow to stay hydrated on Mongolias Gobi plains. In the rocky Namibian desert, elephants desperately search for food and lions wander the wilderness hunting oryx

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Camera crews follow the activities of wildlife in the Arctic and Antarctic, including an emperor penguin colonys nine-month migration across sea ice to its breeding ground. The team also takes aerial and underwater shots to capture humpback whales feeding and tracks a male polar bear as it swims 100km to find new ice from which to hunt seals

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Jim tries to censor part of a publication by the former prime minister that portrays him in a bad light. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington, Nigel Hawthorne and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Jim tries to turn the tables on French officials over the Channel Tunnel borders. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington, Nigel Hawthorne and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Jim gets wind of a major financial scandal in the City that is bound to have damaging repercussions for the government. With the party conference looming, he decides its time for him to take swift and firm action - but Sir Humphrey has other ideas. Political comedy first broadcast in 1987, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Jim feels local government isnt really representative, so is eager to hear more about proposals to reform the system. Sir Humphrey fears this would lead to the civil service losing its power and turns to an unlikely ally to help persuade the prime minister to think again. Political comedy first broadcast in 1988, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Hacker is left with egg on his face when Sir Humphrey makes it known the Government plans to cut arts funding. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington, Nigel Hawthorne and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Jim decides to save money by getting rid of the Department of Education, much to the disgust of Sir Humphrey. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington, Nigel Hawthorne and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson uncovers evidence of the German occupation of the Jersey village of Gorey and the role it played in defending the UK. He meets local historian Phillip Marett, who takes him to the gun tower from where the occupying soldiers could have watched the Battle of Normandy, and hears a first-hand recollection of the liberation of the island

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the last leg of Michael Portillos long journey from Wexford to Westport, a fashionable Victorian seaweed bath is followed by a steamy scene in Ballina. On tenterhooks in Foxford, Michael discovers the visionary charity of an entrepreneurial nun, learns of a double tragedy at Clew Bay and begins a pilgrimage to the summit of Croagh Patrick, Irelands holy mountain

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Wakefield, West Yorkshire, Michael Portillo visits the National Coal Mining Museum for England at Caphouse Colliery. In Leeds, he heads for the Chapeltown area to investigate the origins of the Leeds West Indian carnival in 1967 and tries his hand on the steel drums

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Expedition Borneo
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of the island of Borneo is a lost world of mountains, jungles and ravines which hide a vast abundance of wildlife. Here a team of scientists, climbers and wildlife film-makers gather to explore this extraordinary habitat before it is too late, as felling the rainforest for tropical timber and converting the land to oil palm plantations threaten this extraordinary ecosystem

programme.title: Expedition Borneo
programme.desc: One team searches for elephants, but the unforgiving parasites and leeches of the jungle begin to take their toll. Elsewhere, the mountaineers become lost on a remote peak

programme.title: Expedition Borneo
programme.desc: The team continues its exploration of Borneo, an expedition aimed at tracking down and filming the animals that live there. The adventurers go in search of wild orang-utan and experience a close encounter with a giant python, and one team member is bitten by a coral snake

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: The naturalist leads an expedition into an unexplored desert canyon in the Jebel Akhdar mountain range of Oman. With temperatures soaring, dehydration and heat stroke are a constant threat
