programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Greens thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Greens thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa Azion

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A man buys his pregnant wife a vintage doll, which places their lives in jeopardy. Members of a Satanic cult have their eyes on the antique toy, and break into their house to prepare a ritual that will transform the harmless plaything into a terrifying monster. Horror spin-off from The Conjuring, starring Annabelle Wallis and Ward Horton

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: In the Stone Age, a gang of early humans face a mystical being hellbent on hunting them down. Prehistoric horror, starring Iola Evans and Arno Luning. The dialogue is in a specially contructed language and features subtitles

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: On holiday in Europe, American couple Ben and Louise Dalton and their anxiety-crippled daughter Agnes meet English doctor Patrick Feld, his wife Ciara and their young son Ant, who was born without a tongue. The Daltons vacation soon turns into a nightmare when they are invited to stay on the Felds country estate. Horror, starring James McAvoy, Mackenzie Davis, Scoot McNairy and Aisling Franciosi

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A spaceship crash leaves a renowned war hero and his 13-year-old son stranded on Earth, which was abandoned by the human race centuries ago. Since mankinds departure, the planet has become home to all manner of dangerous life-forms, and the boy must make a desperate journey across hostile terrain to secure a rescue for his injured father. Sci-fi adventure, starring Will and Jaden Smith, with Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious unchartered island in the Pacific, a team of scientists embark on a top-secret mission to the same region. Things soon descend into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming, and they must battle to escape from the domain of the mighty Kong. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Strange Darling
programme.desc: A twisted one-night stand devolves into a serial killers vicious killing spree and a cat-and-mouse chase. Writer/director JT Mollners thriller, starring Willa Fitzgerald, Kyle Gallner, Madisen Beaty and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist attempts to save her career by turning to investigative podcasting. She soon starts to wonder if a strange artefact is linked to an alien conspiracy, or whether she is losing her mind. Director Matt Veselys thriller, starring Lily Sullivan

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: A woman and her friends survive a plane crash, but discover something more dangerous lurking in the shallows of the Louisiana everglades. Horror thriller, starring Athena Strates and Madalena Aragao

programme.title: Lisa Frankenstein
programme.desc: A misunderstood teen embarks on a murderous journey with a reanimated Victorian man to find love, happiness and body parts. Comedy horror written by Diablo Cody, starring Kathryn Newton and Cole Sprouse

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious unchartered island in the Pacific, a team of scientists embark on a top-secret mission to the same region. Things soon descend into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming, and they must battle to escape from the domain of the mighty Kong. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriends father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: A writer takes a caretaking job at a remote mountain hotel. It has closed for the winter, and he has been hired to get the place ready for the next season. But evil spirits haunting its corridors destroy his sanity, causing the unhinged author to rampage through the hotel and terrorise his wife and young son. Stanley Kubricks horror, based on the Stephen King novel, with Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd and Scatman Crothers

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: Two parents do whatever it takes to keep their children safe in a world full of creatures hunting every sound they hear. Nothing can be heard from the family hiding in silence, but all it takes is one noise and everything can go horrifically wrong. Horror, starring real-life husband-and-wife duo Emily Blunt and John Krasinski, who also directed

programme.title: Heart Eyes
programme.desc: When two co-workers survive a killer on Valentines Day, the two have to find out who it is. Comedy horror, starring Mason Gooding, Olivia Holt and Gigi Zumbado

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders investigates the bizarre murders of two women with the same name and unravels a web of small-town lies. He soon falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour who is eager to help solve the mystery. Director John Slatterys comedy thriller, starring Jon Hamm, Nick Mohammed and Tina Fey

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: The skipper of a fishing boat and his crew ignore severe weather warnings and head for a dangerous area of the North Atlantic in search of the last lucrative catch of the season, but end up fighting for survival in the worst storm of the 20th century. Fact-based disaster drama, with George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Diane Lane, John C Reilly and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: An assassination attempt is made on the life of the US president during a terrorism summit. The story unfolds from several perspectives, including that of the secret service agents charged with protecting the head of state, a news producer covering the event and a man in the crowd who may have caught the perpetrator on camera. Thriller, starring Dennis Quaid, Matthew Fox, Forest Whitaker, Sigourney Weaver and William Hurt

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When a spy is suspected of treason, her husband faces the ultimate test - loyalty to his marriage or his country. Director Steven Soderberghs thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Cate Blanchett and Rege-Jean Page

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A cynical petty crook is inspired when he sees a freelance camera crew, and decides to go into business filming crime scenes and accidents, then selling the footage to news broadcasters. His determination to stay ahead of the competition leads him down a dark path as his methods become increasingly ruthless. Crime drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo and Bill Paxton

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patients fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalans thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangsters accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his bosss millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchies crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince a bare-knuckle champion to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchies comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Four teenagers are sentenced to reform school after a prank results in the accidental death of an old man, and suffer sexual abuse at the hands of the guards. Years later, when the boys have grown up and begun to follow very different professions, a chance encounter with one of their abusers inspires them to plot revenge. Drama, starring Brad Pitt, Robert De Niro, Dustin Hoffman, Kevin Bacon, Jason Patric and Minnie Driver

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: A shy clerk marries a hooker and kills her pimp, and together they go on the run to Los Angeles with $5million of cocaine they plan to sell. However, the drugs belong to the Mob and hitmen are soon on their trail. Tony Scotts thriller, written by Quentin Tarantino and starring Christian Slater, Patricia Arquette, Dennis Hopper, Gary Oldman, Val Kilmer, Brad Pitt and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Naked Singularity
programme.desc: An idealistic young New York City public defender - burned out by the system, on the brink of disbarment, and seeing signs of the universe collapsing all around him - decides to rob a multi-million-dollar drug deal of one of his clients. Crime comedy drama, starring John Boyega, Olivia Cooke, Bill Skarsgard and Ed Skrein

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption. Writer/director Jed Harts thriller, starring Lyndsey Marshal and Declan Adamson

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killers enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. Thriller, starring Shailene Woodley, Ben Mendelsohn and Ralph Ineson

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patients fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalans thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

Guy Ritchies crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Two teenagers murder a random victim for their own amusement, convinced nobody will ever suspect them of committing such a senseless crime, and ensure all the evidence points to a drug dealer. However, they reckon without a suspicious and determined detective and her partner. Thriller, starring Sandra Bullock, Ryan Gosling and Michael Pitt

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Following in the footsteps of brother Danny, light-fingered Debbie Ocean plans to steal the Toussaint, a $150million necklace from Vogues Met Gala, with the help of a famous actress. Crime caper, starring Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway and Mindy Kaling

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince a bare-knuckle champion to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Tony Scotts thriller, written by Quentin Tarantino and starring Christian Slater, Patricia Arquette, Dennis Hopper, Gary Oldman, Val Kilmer, Brad Pitt and Christopher Walken

programme.desc: A bookish CIA researcher returns to his field office to find all his colleagues have been murdered in his absence. When he tries to uncover the truth, he also ends up targeted for assassination by his own agency, and is forced to go on the run to discover the reasons why. Sydney Pollacks thriller, starring Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson and Max von Sydow

programme.title: The Godfather Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michaels story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppolas Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale and Lee Strasberg

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer and Joe race against the clock to score a key owners blessing for a Vegas team. Tensions rise between Charles and Larry

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Will takes Graces advice and plays hard-to-get with his new boyfriend, but soon finds this does not seem to be helping matters. Meanwhile, Jack and Karen are distraught to learn their favourite TV show is being axed. Bebe Neuwirth and Sharon Osbourne guest star

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Will introduces his new boyfriend to Grace, and Jack starts looking for a replacement for Karen after she tells him their friendship has to change. Comedy, with Eric McCormack and Debra Messing, guest starring Bobby Cannavale and Amy Farrington

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.sub-title: I Never Cheered for My Father
programme.desc: Will learns his parents are back together and has to explain the situation to a distraught Tina. Meanwhile, Elliot announces he wants to be a cheerleader - and proud father Jack resolves to help him achieve his dream

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Will takes on the task of helping Jack with his graduation speech for nursing school. Unfortunately, he gets completely carried away in his attempts to write something creative and insightful. American sitcom, starring Eric McCormack and Sean Hayes

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Lyle convinces Karen to marry him in Las Vegas, where she bumps into Jennifer Lopez - and persuades her to sing at their wedding. She also meets her fiances strangely affectionate brother, while Leo returns from Cambodia with bad news for Will. First in a two-part series finale, also guest starring John Cleese, Tim Curry and Harry Connick Jr

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie is appalled to see a half-naked mock-up photo of herself on the proposed cover of her book, prompting Samantha to take serious action. Meanwhile, Charlotte sets out to buy a self-help manual, only to find herself hampered by hordes of desperate women scouring the shelves for a copy. Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon and Kristin Davis star

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.sub-title: Plus One Is the Loneliest Number
programme.desc: As Carrie prepares for her book-launch party, she develops a crush on a fellow writer (guest star Ron Livingston), but is heartbroken to learn he already has a girlfriend. Bunny catches Charlotte in a compromising position, Samantha decides to have a chemical peel and Mirandas date with her pre-baby lover Walker does not go to plan

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie worries about Aidans emotional stability after meeting a woman who recently went out with him. Baby Bradys incessant screaming leaves Miranda at her wits end, and Charlotte decides it is time to bring out the big guns in her legal battle with former mother-in-law Bunny. Comedy, featuring a guest appearance by Heather Graham (The Hangover). Evan Handler joins the cast as Harry Goldenblatt

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie ropes Samantha into joining her on a cross-country train journey to San Francisco to promote her new book. While there, the writer hopes to get reacquainted with Mr Big, but it seems he is more intent on discussing where their relationship went wrong. Meanwhile, Charlotte finds herself strangely attracted to her divorce lawyer Harry

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: An invitation to a supposedly gay friends marriage to a society lady prompts Carrie to question what it takes to make a relationship work. Charlotte agrees to attend the event with Harry, and Samantha plans to throw a party at Richards place in the Hamptons. Starring Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Halloween special, in which a chemical turns many of the students turn into zombies, and Dean Pelton leaves the rest to die by locking them in with the walking dead

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Britta, Shirley, and Annie acquire an enemy, and plan to turn Abed into a weapon against her. Jeff and Troy explore their spiritual side while trampolining. Hilary Duff guest stars

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: Annie is convinced there is a thief among the study group, resulting in a lockdown on campus. Troy and Abed are desperate to escape and attend a puppy parade

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: A mysterious professor comes to Jeffs rescue when he is caught out in a lie, but no one seems to know who he is. Abed and Troy build an ambitious fort out of blankets

programme.title: Community
programme.desc: The students go to a bar to celebrate Troys 21st birthday, which Shirley discovers is decorated with incriminating photos of her. Abed bonds with a fellow sci-fi fan

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: The day of Cecelias christening arrives, but the occasion is overcrowded because Michael has invited every single member of staff along. Comedy, starring Steve Carell

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Gabe invites his co-workers to his house to watch an episode of Glee - but the evening is overshadowed by a power struggle between him and Michael. Pam finds herself caught in the middle of Dwight and Angelas peculiar relationship, and Andy confesses a secret to Phyllis

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael encourages his colleagues to invest in Ryans new business idea, but Pam fears his generosity is being exploited. Dwight sets up a hay-themed play area in the car park, and Jim clashes with Gabe when he discovers Sabre has put a limit on the amount of commission sales staff can earn

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael becomes afraid after reading a magazine article about Chinas economic power - but his tenuous grasp on current affairs leads him into a battle of wits with Oscar. Pam loses patience with Dwights penny-pinching management of the office building, and searches for a new site for the company. Comedy, starring Steve Carell

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Part one of two. Michael is thrilled when he learns Holly will be returning to the Scranton office, and orders a second Christmas party to celebrate - but his good mood is short-lived. Pam takes charge of the party planning committee, Jim lives to regret throwing a snowball at Dwight, and Angela eagerly tells her colleagues about her new boyfriend. Comedy, starring Steve Carell, with Amy Ryan

programme.title: Katherine Ryan - Missus
programme.desc: A stand-up show by the comedian in which she reveals how marriage has given her new perspectives on life, love and what it means

programme.title: Chalet Girl
programme.desc: A 19-year-old skateboarding champion gives up the sport as she struggles to support herself and her father. She gets a job working in a ski resort, where she feels out of her comfort zone in high society, but she finds a way to put her old skills to good use by competing in a prestigious snowboarding competition. Comedy, with Felicity Jones, Ed Westwick and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Nish Kumar: Your Power, Your Control
programme.desc: A stand-up performance by the comedian, in which an account of a terrible gig opens a window on Nishs mental health and the rise of nativism

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson as Spencer Strasmore, a former American football player who, after retiring from the game, is living the high-life as a financial manager for a ever-growing roster of hard-partying NFL stars. The series begins as the death of an old team-mate in a car accident provides Spencer with an incentive to make some positive changes to his life. With JD Washington, Rob Corddry and Omar Miller

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Joe realises the firms decision to hire Spencer might be about to pay off when the former NFL player reveals he has all but secured a contract with current star Vernon Littelfield. However, before Littelfield will sign on the dotted line, Spencer must run his plans by Vernons childhood friend and advisor Reggie. Meanwhile, Ricky clashes with a new team-mate during his first practice session with the Dolphins, and Larry Seifert urges lineman-turned-car salesman Charles to consider returning to the game. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer and Joe borrow Old Man Andersons yacht to host an exclusive party, aiming to attract more high-income athletes to the firms books. As the event gets under way, Spencer tells Ricky why fellow Miami player Alonzo dislikes him so much, and a drunken Joe makes a connection with the young players - but doesnt forget to push Andersons agenda. Comedy drama, starring Dwayne Johnson and Rob Corddry

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer and Jason tell Vernon he has received $101million offer from Dallas, but their work on his behalf seems to be in vain as Reggie urges him to hold out for more. Meanwhile, a hung-over Joe hi-jacks Andersons yacht as he aims to court more star players, and Charles receives unwanted attention from a girl he met at the party. Comedy drama, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: The fallout from Spencer and Joes yacht party continues as one of the attendees blackmails Vernon, threatening to take some incriminating pictures into the public domain. Meanwhile, Ricky tries to patch things up with teammate Alonzo by taking him out to a strip club, and Charles makes a fatal error in hiding his secret relationship with stalker-fan Sammi. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, JD Washington, Rob Corddry and Omar Miller

programme.title: Greatest Escapes of WWII
programme.desc: A look at some of the most incredible escapes of the conflict, as captured soldiers, sailors and airmen on both sides dared the impossible to win their freedom. This episode focuses on the German submarines that caused havoc in the American desert, the playboy pilot they couldnt cage and the young lovers whose escape defied all odds

programme.title: Greatest Escapes of WWII
programme.desc: A look at some of the most incredible escapes of the conflict, as captured soldiers, sailors and airmen on both sides dared the impossible to win their freedom. This episode focuses on Hitlers last soldier in America who defied the FBI for 40 years, the prisoners who revealed the secrets of the death camps and the merciless Nazi who almost got away

programme.title: The Secret Nazi Expeditions
programme.desc: There is power in the debate of the true origins of humanity and it became the fixation of a nefarious power as Heinrich Himmler, leader of the Nazis SS, when he turned his attention to proving the Paleolithic past of Germanys Aryan race

programme.title: The Secret Nazi Expeditions
programme.desc: Runes are the letters of an ancient Germanic writing. Himmler made rune studies obligatory for SS officers as he believed they held mystical power and even placed protective runes on SS uniforms and buildings

programme.title: Hell on Earth: WWII
programme.desc: Significant victories against the Germans in the latter stages of the war, including the Soviet surge that pushed German forces back to within 30km of the Polish border, the lifting of the siege of Leningrad after 900 days and the Battle of Normandy

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: The fate of homes in a world without people, where suburbs turn into mass infernos, and a famous castle topples, owing to a hidden flaw

programme.title: Prison Chronicles
programme.desc: The Hanoi Hilton, an American PoW prison of the Vietnam War located in the city of Hanoi. Captives included future United States Senator John McCain, a group of airmen who invented a secret communication code and Jerimiah Denton, who sneaked messages home on live TV

programme.title: Prison Chronicles
programme.desc: The Sing Sing Correctional Facility, situated north of New York City and regarded as one of the countrys most notorious prisons. There have been several break-out attempts over the years

programme.title: Colosseum
programme.desc: Drama-documentary that uses the Colosseum to tell the thrilling story of the rise and fall of the Roman Empire. As the Roman Empire continued to expand, so did the diversity of exotic beasts brought back to entertain the Colosseum crowds. Over one million animals were slaughtered in the arena by trained beast masters, none more famous than Carpophorus

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Experts question what probes on Mars may have found over the past 40 years, asking if Nasa could be hiding proof of life on the Red Planet from the public

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: The Ultimate Evidence
programme.sub-title: Aliens and the Creation of Man
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos takes an in-depth look at more extra-terrestrial mysteries, joining forces with theorists to consider whether unexplained advances in human evolution can be attributed to alien architects

programme.title: Secrets of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: The Ark of the Covenant is said to have been forged by God with gold and holy heavenly fire imbued with the power of God that makes it indestructible. It is also believed to possess a mythical power. The team members trace the Arks destructive path to uncover the truth behind its elusive journey

programme.title: Caesars Doomsday War
programme.desc: Part two of two. Julius Caesars relentless pursuit of power positioned him against a mighty rebel force that fought the infamous Roman general at his own game. Here, archaeologists investigate the truth behind key moments that took Caesar to the brink of defeat

programme.title: Weeks of War
programme.desc: A look at what it was really like to live and survive during one of the most devastating conflicts the world has ever seen

programme.title: WWIIs Most Daring Raids
programme.desc: Detailing how an elite group of British paratroopers managed to launch a midnight raid in order to capture Hitlers unusual radar equipment

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: In Illinois, Robbie and Jersey get exclusive access to a former race car drivers stockpile, where they uncover rare car parts, pristine toys and epic stories from the racetrack

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The sun beats down in Oceanside, California, bringing out all the parasols. Dusty and Lupe steal a no-brainer locker, which pays off handsomely. Darrell taxes himself, which almost puts him in storage jail. Brandi and Lisa find their true identities

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Way of the Gam Gam
programme.desc: While in Santa Ana, Lisa channels her grandmother, in trying to turn a profit. Brandi contends with a tremendously frustrating day, Darrell tries to make a meal out of a snack-sized locker, while Kenny learns to prep himself for true stealthiness

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lisa comes to Montebello with a clear mind, intent on letting the lockers speak to her. Ivy lets his son navigate his way to a unit which turns out not to be completely vacant. Kenny is absolutely appalled by what he finds abandoned in his unit

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Brandi is determined to actually win a locker for once in Santa Ana, but has to show restraint to do it. Rene spots a stack of items in a locker that speaks to him. Kenny puts his needs out to the universe, while Barry struggles to stay in the game

programme.title: Curse of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: After an explosive experiment aimed at the mysterious Bubble, the team members examine the incredible phenomena they have discovered on Skinwalker Ranch with a number of world renown experts and scientists

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick and Corey dart out of the shop to check out a 1968 convertible. Chum wants a piece of an oreodont fossil, while Rick has quite an experience when a seller sends in a Jimi Hendrix poster. Later, a Harry and the Hendersons doll hits the counter

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick prepares for battle over a pair of vintage posters. He and Chum call on the power of Grayskull as they check out a large Battle Cat toy, while Corey takes a look at an old firemans megaphone. Chum also heads over to a photo gallery

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick sets his sights on a musket rifle from the 1800s, while a seller tries to flex with a signed autobiography by actor and politician Arnold Schwarzenegger. An old ventriloquists dummy makes Corey and Ricks heads spin

programme.title: Ramses the Great: King of Ancient Egypt
programme.desc: Ramses ruled Egypt for at least 29 years, although some Egyptologists think he could have ruled for as long as 30. Either way, it was one of the longest reigns in pharaonic history

programme.title: Ramses the Great: King of Ancient Egypt
programme.desc: Merenptah, the 13th son of Ramses II, the great pharaoh of Ancient Egypt. Merenptah became pharaoh after his fathers long reign, when all of his older brothers had died. His reign was marked by feuds between rival branches of the family, and the throne was close to bankruptcy

programme.title: The Egyptian Book of the Dead
programme.desc: A version of the ancient text once buried with an Egyptian scribe called Ani to guide him in the afterlife. The book, now preserved in the British Museum, is the first written account of any religion, a likely source of the Ten Commandments and thought to be the oldest surviving document in human history

programme.title: Iconic Combat Machines
programme.desc: The F-16 Fighting Falcon and MiG-29 Fulcrum, two iconic fourth-generation fighters with different strengths. The F-16 is known for advanced avionics, multirole capability and a proven combat record, while the MiG-29 is regarded as superior in close-quarters dogfighting due to its high thrust-to-weight ratio and exceptional agility

programme.title: A Ship Through Time
programme.sub-title: A Ship Through Time: Secrets of the Newport Ship
programme.desc: Part one of two. Sean Fletcher investigates the secrets of a shipwrecked 15th-century trading galleon found by accident off Newport in south Wales in 2002, her international significance and how two of Europes most turbulent and violent wars shaped her fate. He discovers what this trading galleon carried, and to where and a possible powerful owner. He also sheds light on a possible connection to the Wars of the Roses

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: A secret military base discovered a few hundred miles from the North Pole. A man-made, ancient stone formation is found 120ft below the surface of Lake Huron. A 1,500-year-old burial ground is discovered on the shores of the Baltic Sea. Plus, in Russias far east, a life-form that scientists think can live for thousands of years is discovered in the permafrost

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: Visits to the most remote, cold and inhospitable places on the planet to reveal great mysteries that have been frozen in time. This edition features a giant naval vessel located on the bottom of the Norwegian Sea and an ancient reptile-like creature found in the permafrost of Canadas Arctic. In Scotland, archaeologists are drawn to a strange, figure-eight shaped ditch, while an Antarctic research base finds itself suddenly surrounded by blood-soaked snow

programme.title: American Godfathers: The Five Families
programme.desc: How a decidedly new, more aggressive commitment by law enforcement to eradicate the five New York City Mafia families forced the illicit clans to find creative ways to stay in business - and out of jail

programme.title: Mission Unexplained

Plus, the mysterious drumbeats heard during the Cold War by an intelligence analyst in West Germany

programme.title: Mission Unexplained

programme.title: Secrets in the Jungle

programme.title: Weird Britain
programme.sub-title: Scotland: The Search for the Loch Ness Monster
programme.desc: Andy McGrath joins a team of Nessie experts and volunteers to carry out the biggest search for the Loch Ness Monster in 50 years, utilising the latest hi-tech equipment

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts explores Edinburgh and its role in the union between England and Scotland. She discovers how the famous case of Burke and Hares bodysnatching influenced British medical law, and visits the Royal Bank of Scotland, where she uncovers evidence of the worlds first overdraft. Plus, the role played by Henry Dundas, whose statue stands in St Andrews Square, in the continuation of the slave trade

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts is in Glasgow to investigate the impact of steam power on Britains major towns in the 18th and 19th centuries. She also learns about the arrival of migrant workers in the city and how the insanitary conditions in which they lived, which made Glasgow both a hotbed of disease and a place of great medical advancement. Aerial archaeologist Ben Robinson flies his drone over Loch Katrine as he tells the story of how Victorian engineers overcame geographical barriers to bring fresh drinking water to the workers of Glasgow

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: River detectorist Beau Ouimette and presenter and keen swimmer Rick Edwards go in search of evidence of the clashing Scottish clans embroiled in the civil war that raged across the British Isles in the 17th century. Fights erupted during this period between the Royalists supporting the King and the Covenanters wanting more power for church and state. Starting on the River Lochy, situated in the shadow of Ben Nevis, the pair hunt for evidence of the 1645 Battle of Inverlochy - a pivotal fight that saw the Royalist army launch a surprise attack against the ill-prepared Covenanters

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Rick Edwards and Beau Ouimette look for evidence of Roman life in Scotland, heading to Ardoch Fort in Perthshire, on the east bank of the River Knaik. It spans over eight and a half acres and was built under Agricola around 80AD on the east bank of the River Knaik. The fort occupied a key strategic route through Perthshire and into north-east Scotland from the First to Third centuries

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Perched high on a volcanic crag overlooking the River Forth, Stirling has long been one of the most strategically important castles in Britain. Guarding the gateway to the Highlands, its battle-scarred walls have witnessed savagery and chivalry, intrigue, alchemy, adultery and murder. With the aid of location filming, aerial shots and dramatic reconstructions, Dan Jones examines the history of this stronghold and relates the stories of some of the powerful characters who have owned it over the centuries

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones explores the turbulent history of six of Britains most famous castles, his journey commencing with a visit to Edinburgh Castle. A popular tourist attraction to this day, Dan explores the history of this famous stronghold that began as an Iron Age battle base and remains a military facility to this day, and was the target of the worlds first aerial bombing

programme.title: After Braveheart
programme.desc: The first in a two-part docu-drama revealing the historical events that followed those portrayed in the 1995 film Braveheart, in which Scottish knight William Wallace led the Scots in a revolt against English rule. The programme reveals how Edward Bruce, the brother of King Robert the Bruce, tried to unite the Celtic nations and drive the English out of Ireland in 1315

programme.title: After Braveheart
programme.desc: The concluding part of the docu-drama revealing the historical events that followed those portrayed in the 1995 film Braveheart, in which William Wallace led the Scots in a revolt against English rule

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: For thousands of years, Scotland has been an epicentre of otherworldly phenomena. It is home to mysterious ancient stone circles, stories of strange beings and is a major hotspot for UFO sightings. Given these facts, it has been considered a potential magnet for extraterrestrial visitors

programme.title: Craig Charles: UFO Conspiracies
programme.desc: Craig and co-presenter Sarah Cruddas head to central Scotland, which has its own Area 51, known as the Falkirk Triangle, encompassing the now infamous village of Bonnybridge, which claims the highest concentration of the regions UFO activity. They also investigate the alleged abduction of forestry worker Robert Taylor in 1979, the only British UFO incident to have been officially investigated by the police

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part documentary, the naturalist explores the origins of life on Earth. Beginning the journey near his childhood home in Charnwood Forest, Leicestershire, he learns how a fossil discovery transformed scientists understanding of the evolution of complex organisms, and in Newfoundland and Australia he reveals the earliest kinds of animal to exist on the planet. With the help of cutting-edge technology and visual effects, the programme brings the creatures to life, demonstrating how they survived

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life

programme.desc: The broadcaster concludes his exploration of the archipelago with a look at how, despite their proximity, no two of the 19 islands are the same. programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals
programme.sub-title: From the Seas to the Skies
programme.desc: Part one of two. The naturalist explores the evolution of vertebrates over the past 500 million years, beginning with a look at how remarkable advances allowed primitive fish to make the radical move on to land, and then take to the skies with the advent of flight. He uses fossils of both ancient and living species combined with CGI and film to chart their journey out of the water to populate all corners of the globe

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals
programme.desc: The naturalist concludes his two-part exploration of the evolution of vertebrates over the past 500 million years by looking at the history of mammals. He traces their journey from humble origins as tiny nocturnal forest-dwellers to their astonishing explosion in diversity and domination of the world following the death of the dinosaurs

programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince a bare-knuckle champion to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchies comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael encourages his colleagues to invest in Ryans new business idea, but Pam fears his generosity is being exploited. Dwight sets up a hay-themed play area in the car park, and Jim clashes with Gabe when he discovers Sabre has put a limit on the amount of commission sales staff can earn

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael becomes afraid after reading a magazine article about Chinas economic power - but his tenuous grasp on current affairs leads him into a battle of wits with Oscar. Pam loses patience with Dwights penny-pinching management of the office building, and searches for a new site for the company. Comedy, starring Steve Carell

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Part one of two. Michael is thrilled when he learns Holly will be returning to the Scranton office, and orders a second Christmas party to celebrate - but his good mood is short-lived. Pam takes charge of the party planning committee, Jim lives to regret throwing a snowball at Dwight, and Angela eagerly tells her colleagues about her new boyfriend. Comedy, starring Steve Carell, with Amy Ryan

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Part two of two. Michaels jealousy over Hollys boyfriend gets the better of him, while it is all-out snowball war between Dwight and Jim

programme.title: 12 Days of Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Successful businessman Brian Conway gets into a car accident on December 24, which turns into a life-changing event. Director Dustin Rikerts Groundhog Day-style comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Spencer Grammer, Mitch Poulos and Uschi Umscheid

programme.title: Scealta na gCorn
programme.desc: Gráinne McElwain heads to Limerick. Her first visit is to the countys home ground, where she finds out about an Irish patriot, John Daly, whose name adorns the Limerick Senior Hurling cup. She travels onwards to Mary Immaculate College to hear of the Ladies Football cup, named after a much-loved former lecturer Noreen Lynch. Gráinne cannot leave the county without visiting the homeplace of the renowned hurler Mick Mackey, where she hears about the Munster Senior Hurling cup that is named after this legend of the game

programme.title: Buildings Beo
programme.desc: Carrie Crowley heads to Ballinamore, Co Leitrim, where she falls in love with the towns old railway station, which has fallen into disuse and dereliction. She hears how Ballinamore Community Council devised an exciting plan to revitalise the area by transforming the stunning red-brick junction house into a dynamic multi-purpose hub. From conception to completion, she meets a colourful cast of characters, who are all united in their mission to breathe new life into the junction house

programme.title: Fuascail
programme.desc: A creative contemplation by visual artist, musician and composer Barry Kerr, known as Fuascail. Kerr uses a combination of his musical compositions and visual artistry to portray an abstract reflection on the revolutionary period of Irelands history. Fuascail could by translated as release, redeem or resolve and Kerr uses these three pillars to tease out his own feelings around history, conflict and commemoration. The film is set in Connemara where Kerr spent much time drawing inspiration from the landscape and its history, composing new music and painting new work

programme.title: Cois Moire
programme.desc: Diarmuid Ó Drisceoil nears the end of his journey following in the footsteps of Annraoí Ó Liathain along the Munster River Blackwater. At the turn of the river, where it becomes tidal at Cappaquinn, Diarmuid explains the influence of the Anglo Irish along this stretch of the river, the historic maritime traffic, the salmon fishing, as well as the probable real name for the river, visiting poet Thomas McCarthy as his journey culminates at the historic port and walled town of Youghal where the river meets the sea

programme.title: Beo Faoin bhFod
programme.desc: In 1968, Mick Meaney was buried six foot under the London soil in a simple wooden coffin. Hundreds came to see his burial, and toast Mick on his way. The thing was, Mick was not dead. He was competing in the world record competition for Longest Time Spent Buried Alive

programme.title: Gael-Linn ag 70
programme.desc: The 70th anniversary of the foundation of Gael-Linn, one of the most innovative organisations in late 20th-century Ireland. A transforming organisation that ensured that the Irish language, its people and its culture would have a home in modern Ireland. Performers include Moya Brennan, Mairead Ní Mhaonaigh, Liam Ó Maonlaí, Colm Mac Con Iomaire and Rossa Ó Snodaigh, Maighread and Tríona Ní Dhomhnaill, Mary Bergin and Macdara Ó Faoláin, IMLÉ le Ríona Sally Hartman, Sarah Ghriallais, Muintir Uí Bheaglaoich, Gráinne Holland, Niamh Farrell, and Binneas

programme.title: Athbheatha: Colmcille Ildánach
programme.desc: Artworks commissioned in the visual arts, music and literature by the RIA with the support of the Department of Foreign Affairs as part of its multi-faceted commemoration of the 1,500th anniversary of Colmcilles birth. This programme meets the artists involved in each piece and finds out the inspiration and artistry behind these unique works of art. Contributors include caligrapher Timothy O Neill, glass artist Roisín de Buitlear, poets Biddy Jenkinson, Sandy Nic Dhòmhnaill Jones, Simon Ó Faoláin, writer Proinsias Mac a Bhaird and musicians Zoe Conway, Julie Fowlis, Éamonn Doorley and John McIntyre

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade is joined by comedian Joe Wilkinson for a two-day break in Polands second city Krakow, beginning by attending a baking workshop, before heading to a salt mine to marvel at the worlds largest underground chapel. They also drive to Nowa Huta, a showcase suburb of socialist realism, where they end up in an authentic communist-era apartment - with obligatory vodka and pickles. After a lunch of pierogi dumplings, they take part in a stained glass workshop at the centre of Krakows art nouveau movement

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade is joined by comedian Lou Sanders for a two-day break in the Norwegian city of Bergen, taking a speedboat transfer from the airport to their waterfront lodgings. They explore the historic neighbourhood of Bryggen, ride a cable car to the top of Mt Ulriken and fly down the fastest zipline in Norway - against Richards better judgement

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Nat and John think they have found a bargain when the team visits Barking in east London, while two former rivals team up when a vintage vehicle sparks a bidding war

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: The gang is on Barry and Darrens home turf in Reading, Berkshire, where the pair are determined not to leave empty-handed. Meanwhile, Dan takes a gamble

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff, Chris Harris and Paddy McGuinness head to the Lake District for an emotional reunion with their own dads old cars. Elsewhere, Chris heads out on track to test Lamborghinis most powerful car ever, the hybrid Sian

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The team takes some of greatest-ever cars featured in James Bond movies for a spin, including the iconic Aston Martin DB5. Freddie Flintoff gets behind the wheel of an Extreme E race car and puts it to the test against a man in a jet-pack, while Chris Harris and Paddy McGuinness test a new Ferrari against a very old Alfa

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The competing teams motorless vehicles use gravity as their only form of propulsion in the Belgian capital of Brussels

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Rival teams of amateur racers pit their wacky, gravity-powered soapbox vehicles in a downhill race against the clock in Paris

programme.title: Guy Martins Battle of Britain
programme.desc: Part two of two. Guys training ramps up at the UKs only aerial combat school, where he must master dogfighting at 200mph, handling extreme g-force, and flying upside down. He enlists the help of the Parachute Regiment for a unique experiment demonstrating the firepower of Second World War aircraft machine guns, before being allowed behind the joystick of the worlds only two-seater Hawker Hurricane to face a Messerschmitt 109 in the skies over Kent

programme.title: James Mays Cars of the People
programme.desc: The presenter examines how the car industry in Germany and Japan blossomed following the Second World War, becoming manufacturing giants that far outstripped the Allied nations that had defeated them. He test drives some of the vehicles Germany and Japan produced during the post-war period, as well as an assortment of other classic cars, including E-Types and Mustangs. He also reveals the sad tale of the Austin Allegro, a vehicle that had a devastating impact on the British car industry

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Presenters Alex Jones and Rav Wilding, actor and comedian Chris McCausland and comedy actress Su Pollard join host Rob Brydon and regular captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the offbeat panel show. As usual, the participants set out to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible fibs about themselves in a bid to secure a team victory, through rounds such as Home Truths and Quick-fire Lies

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Alison and Mike camp in the grounds while the house is being fumigated for woodworm, and become competitive over who is the better camper. Pat and the Captain embrace the chance to spend some time in the great outdoors again, but Mary is terrified that the woodworm men intend to rid the house of its ghostly residents and resolves to scare them away

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Alison invites Lucy to stay, but begins to worry about her real motivations after a dire warning from her solicitor. The Captain decides to put his surveillance skills to the task of discovering whether Lucy is who she claims to be. A prank by Julian leaves Mike with an inappropriate e-mail and some awkward explaining to do with his new boss. Comedy, starring Charlotte Ritchie and Jessica Knappett

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Alison realises that Kittys fond memories of her sister conceal a darker truth, and tries to help her come to terms with her past. The rest of the ghosts fear that getting Kitty to open up will just be traumatic for everyone - but end up sharing some unresolved issues of their own. Mike resorts to witchcraft in a bid to see the ghosts for himself

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee and Lucy get a family pet in an attempt to teach the children to be more responsible. But as ever, things do not quite work out as planned. Domestic comedy, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton, with a guest appearance from former EastEnders actress Annette Badland (Aunt Babe)

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee Mack and Sally Bretton star in the domestic comedy which sees the couple appear to go from one disaster to the next, while coping with their three kids, Lucys disapproving parents, Lees feckless dad Frank and their world-weary friends Toby and Anna. This week the couple become addicted to a TV box set, causing them to cancel dinner with Toby and Anna at the last moment. But when they lie about the reason, it only succeeds in opening up a huge can of worms. Domestic comedy, with Hugh Dennis and Abigail Cruttenden

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee and Lucy are trying to make the family healthier, so they are not too happy about the school lollipop man handing out sweets to the kids. Domestic comedy, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie struggles to stay awake and fill the overnight hours at a local telethon when Tom and former NBA star Detlef Schrempf are sidetracked at a nightclub. However, a surprise marriage proposal could rescue the event. Comedy, starring Amy Poehler

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Everybody gets excited about celebrating Aprils 21st birthday, except for Leslie, who fears her budget is about to be cut by the state auditors office. Comedy, starring Amy Poehler and Aubrey Plaza

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: The government is shut down and the parks are closed, but Leslie tries to stage a childrens party in the vacant space. Meanwhile, Aprils jealousy endangers her chances of getting together with Andy. Comedy, starring Amy Poehler and Aubrey Plaza

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade is joined by comedian Nish Kumar for a short break in Portugals second city, starting their trip with a welcome tipple of its eponymous fortified wine. To get their bearings, they hire electric scooters and refuel with Portos favourite sandwich, the meaty francesinha, before having a 5D cinema experience and climbing the Arrabida bridge. Nish makes a confession at a church, and then the duo indulge in a selection of local pastries with a cake connoisseur, and test out artisanal soap

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and comedian Ellie Taylor head to the Spanish capital for a two-day break, following an itinerary rich in art, history, histrionics and ham. The pair go on a guided tour in which they view masterpieces by Bosch, Velasquez, Picasso and Dali, before they attend a ham-carving workshop and a sample a five-course tasting menu, of which four courses are pork or ham, including a tartare dish. They also take in a lively boating lake, a circus church and a grisly tour of the Spanish Inquisition

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers explore the nations love affair with beer and cider, revealing how at one time it was safer to drink ale than water. The duo are also given a chance to gain hands-on brewing experience at a cider festival

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul Whitehouse and Bob Mortimer head to Norfolk, where they attempt to ensnare a large pike - a fish that has eluded them on their trips so far. As they arrive and get their gear together, Bob introduces Paul to the surprisingly varied contents of his car boot, much to Pauls amusement. They gather their equipment and find a decent spot that should give them plenty of chances to catch and make camp for the day. They end their trip with a visit to a local pub, where Bob reveals a hidden trick

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul and Bob fish for brown trout on the river Test in Hampshire, using a Victorian fly-casting technique pioneered in the area as well as an authentic 19th-century rod. The Mayflies are hatching, and the famously short-lived insects inspire some thoughts on the ephemeral nature of life, and what they would do if they only had 24 hours left

programme.title: Guy Martins Battle of Britain
programme.desc: Part two of two. Guys training ramps up at the UKs only aerial combat school, where he must master dogfighting at 200mph, handling extreme g-force, and flying upside down. He enlists the help of the Parachute Regiment for a unique experiment demonstrating the firepower of Second World War aircraft machine guns, before being allowed behind the joystick of the worlds only two-seater Hawker Hurricane to face a Messerschmitt 109 in the skies over Kent

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff heads to Iceland to compete in the worlds maddest motorsport, while Paddy McGuinness gets to grips with the latest Toyota Supra. Chris Harris investigates the story of the Lotus 79, arguably the most beautiful F1 car of all time

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Paddy McGuiness, Chris Harris and Freddie Flintoff go on a road trip in a trio of affordable second-hand convertibles. Chris puts the Ariel Atom through its paces and Freddie goes bungee jumping off a dam in an old Rover

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: US host Sean Kelly oversees UK bidders in Lewes, East Sussex, where a vehicle sends bids sky high, John has spotted treasure, and Scotty and Dan play dirty

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: US host Sean Kelly oversees UK bidders battling to win potential treasures found in storage containers, lock-ups and garages in Ipswich

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: US host Sean Kelly oversees UK bidders battling to win potential treasures found in storage containers, lock-ups and garages in Kent

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: US host Sean Kelly oversees bidders battling to win potential treasures found in Yeovils storage containers, lock-ups and garages. Linda has to work for her profit and tensions reach boiling point as Dan pushes Nat to her limits

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers celebrate quality produce that needs to be cooked with the respect it deserves, as they continue their culinary journey through time. The duo argue that, while convenience food serves a purpose, only the best ingredients and perfect cooking can produce something truly delicious

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers explore the nations love affair with beer and cider, revealing how at one time it was safer to drink ale than water. The duo are also given a chance to gain hands-on brewing experience at a cider festival

programme.title: Ireland with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Part one of two. Simon explores the history of both the Republic of Ireland and Northern Ireland and examines the rich culture and troubled past of the island. Simon arrives by ferry in Co Wexford and travels along the coast, joining the thousands who try to climb the sacred mountain of Croagh Patrick. He crosses the border to visit Crom Castle and Londonderry, before journeying to the northernmost point at Malin Head

programme.title: Ireland with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Part two of two. The second leg of Simons journey begins at the Giants Causeway, before visiting a kelp farm on Rathlin Island. He heads to the Dark Hedges in Co Antrim, one of the filming locations from Game of Thrones, and visits Belfast for the July 12 parades, discovering how the event has divided the city. He also learns more about Oliver Cromwells influence on Ireland, attends the Gaze film festival, and meets monkeys at an animal sanctuary in the Wicklow mountains

programme.title: Border Force: Americas Gatekeepers
programme.desc: Millions of dollars worth of marijuana is found hidden in a shipment of mattresses, and officers detain a mother and daughter who have been smoking meth

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul Whitehouse and Bob Mortimer head to Norfolk, where they attempt to ensnare a large pike - a fish that has eluded them on their trips so far. They gather their equipment and find a decent spot that should give them plenty of chances to catch and make camp for the day. They end their trip with a visit to a local pub, where Bob reveals a hidden trick

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Rob Brydon hosts the comedy panel show, in which team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack are joined by guests Dara O Briain, Denise Van Outen, Rhod Gilbert and Vernon Kay, who try to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible lies about themselves

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts an extended episode of the current affairs quiz, with team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton joined by Stacey Dooley and Andy Hamilton

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Host Dara O Briain and regulars Hugh Dennis and Andy Parsons are joined by Gary Delaney, Rob Beckett, Romesh Ranganathan and Josh Widdicombe for an edition the topical comedy quiz from 2013, with the panellists giving their take on the weeks major news stories

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Host Dara O Briain and regulars Hugh Dennis and Andy Parsons are joined by Seann Walsh, Milton Jones, Miles Jupp and Josh Widdicombe on the topical comedy quiz, with the panellists giving their take on the weeks major news stories. From 2013

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Babatunde Aleshe introduces Chloe Petts and Lindsey Santoro to Londons Hammersmith Apollo stage, where they perform their stand-up routines

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Extended edition of the comedy panel game, in which the united-related questions are so difficult, points are awarded for interesting - but not necessarily correct - answers. Nabil Abdulrashid, Bill Bailey, Victoria Coren Mitchell and Alan Davies take part, while Sandi Toksvig hosts

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade is joined by comedian Joe Wilkinson for a two-day break in Polands second city Krakow, beginning by attending a baking workshop, before heading to a salt mine to marvel at the worlds largest underground chapel. They also drive to Nowa Huta, a showcase suburb of socialist realism, where they end up in an authentic communist-era apartment - with obligatory vodka and pickles. After a lunch of pierogi dumplings, they take part in a stained glass workshop at the centre of Krakows art nouveau movement

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.desc: Rebel Wilson joins Richard Ayoade on a rapid-fire tour of the Italian city, taking in as much as they can in just two days. They race past iconic works of art including Botticellis Venus and Michelangelos David, take in some street art, go on a rafting trip down the River Arno, climb to the top of the citys cathedral and dine on a traditional tripe sandwich

programme.title: Birds of a Feather
programme.desc: Tracey rings a local radio station with advice for a grieving widow and ends up becoming the airwaves latest agony aunt _ but can she pluck up the courage to admit shell only be a widow herself for as long as Her Majesty pleases? Comedy, starring Pauline Quirke, Linda Robson and Lesley Joseph

programme.title: Birds of a Feather
programme.desc: Snobby neighbour Dorien shuns exclusive boutiques and begins buying clothes from down-market department stores in a knee-jerk response to her mothers decision to marry a much younger man - leading Sharon and Tracey to suspect serious psychological problems. Comedy, starring Pauline Quirke, Linda Robson, Lesley Joseph and Peter Polycarpou

programme.title: Birds of a Feather
programme.sub-title: All Day and All of the Night
programme.desc: Sharon is outraged to learn her husbands cousin has been using the cafe as a Greek nightclub, while Doriens self-esteem is boosted by a passionate new affair. Comedy, starring Pauline Quirke, Linda Robson and Lesley Joseph

programme.title: Pie in the Sky
programme.desc: Crabbe investigates a crooked takeaway whose staff he suspects of cooking up a burglary, but as he delves deeper into the case he finds an altogether more sinister operation. Crime drama, starring Richard Griffiths, Maggie Steed, Samantha Janus and Malcolm Sinclair

programme.title: Pie in the Sky
programme.desc: Fisher comes under suspicion following a tragic accident during a pheasant shoot on a country estate, and asks Crabbe to investigate the case. Starring Richard Griffiths, Malcolm Sinclair and Ingrid Lacey

programme.title: Pie in the Sky
programme.desc: A wealthy Irishwoman descends on the restaurant with her new husband in tow who turns out to be a figure from Margarets wild past in swinging 1960s London. Crime drama, starring Richard Griffiths, Maggie Steed and Nigel Terry

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: The priest becomes embroiled in an audacious art heist masterminded by his adversary Flambeau, who intends to use Father Brown and his friends to help him settle an old score. Fifties-set crime drama, starring Mark Williams

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: Sandra takes drastic measures to prevent Jack exacting revenge on the hit-and-run driver who killed his wife. With the teams future under threat, she tries desperately to keep the truth about the incident from shady new recruit DS Karen Hardwick, while working on a 10-year-old murder case to restore the squads reputation. Amanda Redman and Lynda Bellingham star

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: Sandras private and professional worlds become intertwined when her mother has a fall that means she needs to go into a care home. Her first choice is revealed to be the scene of a suspicious death a year earlier, leading Jack, Gerry and Brian to go undercover at the home. Drama, guest starring June Whitfield, Sheila Hancock and Gwyneth Strong

programme.title: Darby and Joan
programme.desc: Jack and Joans search for a missing boy is complicated by the sudden arrival of Joans daughter Rebecca

programme.title: Darby and Joan
programme.desc: The return of a familiar figure from her travels helps Joan piece together the truth about her husband, and a threat from Jacks policing days re-emerges

programme.title: The Chelsea Detective
programme.desc: Part one of two. Max looks into the disappearance of a social media star married to the owner of an upmarket eatery and part of the Romanos, a combustible clan of restaurateurs. Adrian Scarborough stars

programme.title: The Chelsea Detective
programme.desc: Part two of two. Max may have bitten off more than he can chew when the missing persons case becomes a murder investigation - and he finds himself embroiled in explosive family politics. Adrian Scarborough stars

programme.title: The Brokenwood Mysteries
programme.desc: The Brokenwood Health Retreat suffers a massive public relations problem when a spa guest dies in the steam room. While investigating the tricky case, Mike and his team encounter family feuds, spiritual rituals and a missing ring. Drama, starring Neil Rea and Fern Sutherland

programme.title: Sherwood
programme.desc: With two killers now on the run, Ian is reluctantly forced to call in the Met to assist in the manhunt, worried how the locals will feel about the arrival of the London force after events during the miners strike. Meanwhile, the hunt for the mystery spycop intensifies as a link to Scott is found. Crime drama, starring David Morrissey

programme.title: Rebus
programme.desc: While Rebus looks into the apparent suicide of a man at an investment bank, Clarke investigates a stabbing on the seedy Westmills estate. The inspector learns his victim had links to a chemical company building a new plant in the area, as well as an Angolan village where children have been used unscrupulously in drug testing - but before his latest informant can pass on vital evidence, she too is silenced. Drama, starring Ken Stott and Claire Price

programme.title: Darby and Joan
programme.desc: The return of a familiar figure from her travels helps Joan piece together the truth about her husband, and a threat from Jacks policing days re-emerges

programme.title: The Brokenwood Mysteries
programme.desc: The Frog and Cheetahs publican Ray Neilson branches out into tourism with a Lord of the Rings-themed attraction. Suspicion soon falls on Ray and local arachnologist Chandra Singh

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Beechs dodgy past catches up with him when gangster Jimmy Smith calls in a favour. However, Burnside is becoming suspicious of his corrupt colleague. Leslie Grantham and Denise Van Outen guest star

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Daly and Rawton find themselves pulling pints as part of an investigation into a protection racket targeting pubs, giving a whole new meaning to the phrase behind bars. Ray Ashcroft and Libby Davison star

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Quinnan and Boulton tackle the strange case of a drugged dog and a shady hippy, while Hollis defends the reputation of Sun Hill in a pub quiz. Police drama, starring Andrew Paul, Russell Boulter and Jeff Stewart

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Santini and Page investigate when a young girl is knocked down in a hit-and-run incident. With the child recovering in hospital, Santini discovers she is a big fan of Arsenal, and in particular Emmanuel Petit. Santini has a contact in the sports promotion industry and boasts that he can make a dream come true for the youngster by getting Petit to visit, but Page isnt sure he can deliver. Meanwhile, Stamp has the job of organising the relief Christmas party, and finds a very cheap supplier for the booze, until he gets caught up in the middle of a Customs raid. Michael Higgs stars, with a guest appearance by former soccer star Emmanuel Petit

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: A Christian Scientist couple refuse medicine for their newborn baby, leaving Sister Julienne questioning the nature of absolute faith. However, the case becomes more complicated when the parents are accused of harming their child. Barbara uses her initiative to communicate with a pregnant Sylheti woman who cannot speak English, although using the patients young son to translate provides new problems. Sister Mary Cynthia returns to Nonnatus House and a woman catches handyman Freds eye

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: A diabetic teenager faces a tough time after falling pregnant, a situation complicated by her boyfriends criminal past. Nurse Crane offers what support she can - but the girls life is endangered when the young lovers go on the run. A case of petty theft brings a group of Irish travellers to the attention of the midwives, who end up treating a newborn infant and looking after an expectant mother, and it seems Freds romance is on the up when he asks Violet to accompany him to a fundraising dance

programme.title: Catherine Cooksons A Dinner of Herbs
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama based on the novel by Catherine Cookson, starring Billie Whitelaw as a herbalist who takes an 11-year-old orphan under her wing. With Tim Healy, Jonathan Kerrigan and Michael Jayston

programme.title: Last Tango in Halifax
programme.desc: Alan and Celia have tied the knot at last - but their first day as man and wife isnt exactly plain sailing. Caroline finds a way to buy John out of the house, only for her relationship to be threatened by Kates desire for a baby, and a new arrival surprises everyone - especially Gillian. Derek Jacobi and Anne Reid star in Sally Wainwrights light-hearted drama, with Sarah Lancashire, Nicola Walker, Tony Gardner and Nina Sosanya

programme.title: Hotel Portofino
programme.desc: Afraid she might lose the hotel, Bella tries to speed up her new business. Cecil is approached by an old enemy

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: When a Professor Y convention descends on the village, Sister Boniface finds herself investigating the mysterious disappearance of the shows creator

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: When a man falls from a high-rise building, the Lyell team are drawn into the criminal underworld of notorious mafia-group, the Ndrangheta. Nikki and the team set out to uncover the truth

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: Brian finds the library card of cold case victim Dr Richard Symes, leading the team to reinvestigate the death of the professor, who perished after falling from the roof of his college three years previously. Sandra and Gerry interview Symes widow, who believes principal Jeremy Ventham drove her husband to suicide following a conflict over teaching methods. Crime drama, starring Alun Armstrong and Amanda Redman

Beatrice hopes to bond with Gloria and ropes her in on a girls day out. Meanwhile, Snell has a dream that sets him off on an adventure, and Mrs Thing is persuaded to leave her money to the church. Rory Bremner guest stars as the local vicar

programme.desc: Max and Priya discover that although Oliver Cowie appears to have been well-liked , there are no shortage of suspects in his murder
